One member is Señora Yeny. She is 28 years old,  lives with her partner, and has two children. She works in her restaurant business. She prepares breakfasts, lunches, and dinners. In the past she had a business selling beauty products, but it did not go very well for her. She has been in the restaurant business for two years now. In her free time she likes to go for walks with her children. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. She is applying for the loan to buy ingredients for cooking, such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

The other members' businesses are a grocery store, selling handicrafts, selling corn, and selling animals.

Señora Yeny is grateful to those who form part of her dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking, such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Stivel Alain

texts.es:
Stivel es un joven de 25 años de edad, que decidió montar su propio negocio considerando que sería la mejor alternativa para comenzar con su proyecto de vida, actualmente lleva 7 años con su licorera, la cual ha sido el sustento para el y su madre, actualmente espera obtener un crédito que le permita realizar una inyección de capital para mejorar la locación y comprar los productos para la venta es esta temporada navideña.
Stivel sueña con ver su negocio como uno de los mejores del sector, proporcionándoles un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Stivel is a 25-year-old young man who decided to start his own business because he deemed it the best option to start his life plan. His liquor store has been in business for seven years, during which it has been his and his mother's source of income. 

He currently hopes to obtain a loan that allows him to inject capital into his business so that he can improve his location and purchase products to sell this Christmas season.

Stivel would love to see his business become one of the best in the area, offering his customers good service.

loans.use: to make improvements and purchase stock.

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Isabel esta solicitando un préstamo para la instalación del cableado de luz en su vivienda y que el que tiene horita esta en malas condiciones y tiene miedo de que pueda pasar un accidente a su familia.
La señora María Isabel es empleada de una fábrica en el aria de producción y su esposo el señor Jesús Rodolfo trabaja para una maquiladora donde elaboran productos eléctricos.
Con el sueldo que recibe la señora María Isabel será para pagar el crédito y que el ingreso que obtiene le señor Jesús Rodolfo es para los gastos familiares y escolares.
Desean mejor su patrimonio y la seguridad de sus hijos.
La señora María Isabel ya ha tenido crédito con KIVA el cual pago puntual y fue para los gastos escolares de su hijos quienes siguen estudiando para que sean unos triunfadores  en la su futuro.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is requesting a loan to install electrical wiring in her house, because the wiring in her house is in bad condition and she fears that there could be an accident affecting her family.

Maria Isabel is employed in the production area of a factory, and her husband, Jesus Rodolfo, works for a maquiladora where they manufacture electrical products.  

With the salary that she receives, Maria Isabel will pay off the loan, as the income of Jesus Rodolfo is used to pay for the household and school expenses.

Maria Isabel wants to have a better property and to have security for her children.

Maria Isabel has already taken a loan with Kiva, which she paid off on time.  That loan was to pay for some school expenses for her children, so that they could continue to study and become successful in the future.

loans.use: to change out the electrical wiring in her house

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
En la vida es común encontrarnos con historias que llenan nuestro corazón de emotividad, las cuales nos sirven de ejemplo para mejorar y nunca dejar de luchar por nuestros sueños, tal es la historia de vida de doña Claudia que a sus 45 años de edad, siempre está en búsqueda de encontrar su fuente de sustento para ella y su familia, en la actualidad cuenta con una pequeña tienda en su casa, pero desea ampliar su fuente de ingreso debido a que sus gastos no alcanzan a cubriesen, por tal motivo recurre a un crédito para comprar pollos de engorde y una cerda para la cría, que le proporcionen un aumento en sus ingresos

Su mayor deseo es mejorar su condición económica, poder gozar de una vida digna y podérsela ofrecer a su familia.
texts.en: In life, it is common to find ourselves with stories that fill our hearts with emotion, which serve as our example to improve and never to stop fighting for our dreams.  Such is the story of Claudia, who is forty-five.  She is always in search of finding her source of sustaining herself and her family.  Currently she has a small store in her home, but she hopes to expand her source of income since she cannot cover all of her expenses.  This is why she is requesting a loan to buy chickens to fatten and a pig to raise so she can increase her income.  Her biggest hope is to improve her economic condition, to enjoy a worthy life, and to be able to offer one to her family.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise and a pig.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es: Doña Mariela de 64 años de edad es una viva representación de que cuando se quiere es posible obtener lo que se sueña, desde hace doce años se ha dedicado a la costura y con su empeño a logrado crear una microempresa dedicada a la fabrican de uniformes para los colegios de su comunidad. Su propósito es poder expandir su negocio y para lograrlo solicita un préstamo que destinará a la compra de insumos y el mantenimiento de su máquina de coser, lo cual le permitirá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Mariela is 64 years old. She is a living representation of how when one wants something it is possible to achieve what they dream for. For twelve years she has made a living at tailoring. With her hard work she has been able to create a micro business. She works making uniforms for students in her community. 

Her proposal is to expand her business and to request a loan that she will use to purchase supplies and repair her sewing machine. This will allow her to make more of an income for her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies and repair her machine.

loans.name: Nataly

texts.es: Nataly es una joven emprendedora de 27 años de edad, que desde niña ha deseado tener su propio negocio y aunque se ha enfrentado en la vida con circunstancias adversas, siempre ha encontrado la manera de sacar el mejor provecho de ellas. Su bebe de 1 año es su mayor motivación y esta es la principal razón por la que a decidido montar el negocio de jugos a las afueras de un colegio, con el propósito de que su situación económica mejore y poderle brindar a su hijo una mejor condición de vida. Ha recurrido a la solicitud de un crédito para financiar dicho proyecto y poder comprar los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de los productos. Debido a que no cuenta con capital propio.
texts.en: Nataly is an enterprising youth of 27 years, who has wanted to have her own business ever since she was a child.  Although she has faced adverse circumstances in her life, she has always found a way to make a living and support her family.  She has a 1 year-old baby who is her main motivation in life, and is the main reason why she decided to start up a juice business outside of a school.  Her goal is to improve her financial situation and be able to provide her child with better living conditions.  She has returned to request a loan so that she can finance this project, and so that she can buy the supplies she needs to make the products.  She needs a loan because she lacks her own capital.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make natural  juices

loans.name: Josè Humberto

texts.es: José Humberto  de 32 años de edad, es un campesino dedicado a la cría y al  levante de pollos, en conjunto con su esposa y su hija de 8 años de edad que día a día son su mayor motivación. José sueña con brindarle a su hija una excelente educación y a su esposa una mejor calidad de vida, es por ello que solicita un crédito destinado a la compra de gallinas ponedoras y pollos que le permitan acrecentar su capacidad de producción, debido a que su propósito es crear una distribuidora de huevos para generar mayores ingresos y sostener su núcleo familiar.
texts.en: José Humberto is 32 years old and he and his wife raise chickens.  His eight year old daughter is their main daily motivation.   José dreams of providing an excellent education for his daughter and a better quality of life for his wife.  He is asking for this loan to buy egg-laying hens and chickens that will allow him to increase production.  He wants to set up an egg distributorship to generate greater income and support his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and suppiles.

loans.name: Emilse

texts.es:
En ocasiones los momentos difíciles se convierten en grandes oportunidades de soñar más alto y de proponerse retos y alcanzarlos. Este es el caso de Emilsen  una mujer cabeza de familia de 43 años de edad, a quien la vida no le ha mostrado su mejor cara,  nunca se imaginó que pudiese tener negocio propio y hoy anda en búsqueda de este sueño que cada vez hace más cercano, para alcanzarlo ella solicita un crédito para la compra de un carro de comidas rápidas con freidora y plancha, el cual trabajará con su hermana.

Su mayor sueño está por cumplirse y cuando esto suceda llegarán otros que la harán vibrar día a día para alcanzarlos.
texts.en: Sometimes the hardest times turn into the best opportunities to dream bigger and create the challenges to reach your dream. This is Emilsen's situation. She is 43, head of her household, and life has never shown her its best side. She never imagined that she could own her own business, but today she is trying to realize that dream, which appears ever closer. She is applying for a loan to buy a fast food car with a fryer and grill that she and her sister will use for work. Her great dream is to accomplish this, and when this happens, other dreams will appear and inspire her each day to achieve them.

loans.use: to buy a fast food car.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis tiene 22 años vive en el departamento de La Paz en la Zona de Sopocachi , comenzó a trabajar con esta actividad a la edad  de 20 años en el comercio de CD de música, Películas en Dvd, Películas en BLueRay  para poder obtener  más  ingresos para poder cubrir los gastos de alimentación y algunos servicios. Jorge Luis se independizo a  los 18 años, pero vive actualmente  en casa en su mama a la cual le colabora con gastos del domicilio el vende en puestos móviles en ferias, mercados, etc. tiene experiencia de dos años en esta actividad y se sacrifica en diversos horarios para vender mas. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de mercadería (CD, DVD, etc.) por fin de año donde existe mas demanda y venta es mayor , para así poder salir adelante y lograr muchos más sueños que él tiene, específicamente tener en un futuro una tienda propia donde pueda ofrecer sus productos y así cumplir sus metas y sueños.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis, 22, lives in the department of La Paz in the Sopocachi area.  He began to work in this business at the age of 20.  He sells music CDs and movies on DVD and Blu-ray so he can get more income to be able to cover his expenses for food and some services.  Jorge Luis became independent at the age of 18, but currently he lives in his mother's house where he contributes to the household expenses.

He sells in different spots at street fairs, markets, etc.  He has two years of experience in this business and he makes the sacrifice with a variety of schedules so he can sell more.

The loan he's requesting is to buy merchandise (CDs, DVDs, etc.)  for the end of the year when there's more demand and sales are better.  This way he can get ahead and realize many more of his dreams, specifically to have a store of his own in the future where he can sell his products and achieve his goals and dreams.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: La Sra. Lidia tiene 25 años de edad ella vive en la población de Chimore, de la provincia carrasco, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, ella se encuentra concubinada con el sr. Daniel con la cual tiene 3 hijos,  Lidia se dedica a la Agricultura en el sindicato Progreso a unos 22,5 km de la población de chimore, se dedica  junto a su esposo ambos se dedican a la Producción de Plátano, ellos se volvieron a levantar  junto a su esposo tomaron un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezó de cero.  El préstamo que solicita Lidia es para la Implementación de Cultivos de Plátano  y de esa manera podrá tener más ingresos y poder ayudar a sus hijos a terminar alguna carrera sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijos ya que ella no pudo terminar una carrera, pero él quiere que sus hijos si puedan realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en:
Lidia is 25 years old and lives in the town of Chimore, in the province of Carrasco in the city of Cochabamba. She is in a common-law relationship with Daniel with whom they have three children. Lidia works in agriculture in a union called Progreso about  22.5 kilometers from the town of Chimore. She works with her husband and they produce plantains. Together with her husband they took a new path starting with nothing. 

Lidia is requesting a loan for the implementation of plantain crops so they may have more income and be able to help their children finish their degree. She dreams of a better future for her children as she couldn’t finish her degree. Daniel wants his children to get a degree and to help people in the area.

loans.use: to implement plantain crops.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es: Ismael de 49 años de edad, siempre ha sido una persona muy dedicada a su familia y al bienestar de todos en su hogar. Él vive junto a cuatro hijos y una pequeña nieta, así mismo vive junto a su compañera de vida. Ismael ha trabaja durante muchos años en su taller de mecánica automotriz, donde repara carros, y vende diferentes tipos de repuestos, el hace muy bien su trabajo por lo que posee clientes fijos y constantes lo que le ayuda mucho a Ismael a sostener el taller. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de repuestos que en la actualidad es lo que más necesita para mejorar su negocio, ya que esto le ayuda a mantener sus ganancias. Así mismo invertirá en la compra de herramientas y productos que necesite para mejorar su servicio.
texts.en:
Ismael, 49, has always been dedicated to his family and their well-being. He lives with his four children, his young granddaughter, and his life partner. Ismael has worked for years in his automotive repair shop, repairing cars and selling spare parts. He has loyal customers who support his shop because he does a good job.  

He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that he will use to buy more spare parts, which is very important to growing his business and maintaining his profit. He will also buy tools and products to improve his service.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to resell.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: La cliente, Mirian, es un señorita de 18 años de edad, es soltera, la cliente trabaja en una empresa de Editorial en la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente la cliente vive por la zona oeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba, aproximadamente a 5.5 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, la casa donde vive la cliente no es propia, la cliente vive con su hijo pequeño en alquiler, la cliente tiene 1 hijo dependiente de sus ingresos y el destino del nuevo crédito de la institución es para la compra de mercadería (libros), debido a que se dedica a la venta de libros, en la actualidad la mercadería que la cliente maneja está muy caro, y necesita el capital para el negocio, ya que se está agotando el pago del alquiler de la casa donde viven, y así u otra manera podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus familia, es por lo cual reflejamos esta pequeña historia del cliente.
texts.en: Mirian, the client, is 18 years old and single.  She works for a publishing company in the city of Cochabamba.  She currently lives in the western zone of the city of Cochabamba, about 5.5 km from the city of Cochabamba.  The house where she lives is not her own; she lives with her young son in a rental house.  She has one son who depends on her income.  The purpose of her new loan from the organization is to buy merchandise (books), because she works selling books.  The merchandise that she deals with is very expensive, and she needs capital for her business because she uses up her salary to pay the rent on the house where she lives.  Thus she will have another way of meeting the needs of her family.  For this reason we are presenting this small story about the client.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to increase her sales.

loans.name: Edwin Arnoldo

texts.es: Edwin de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja como empleada de una empresa privada y junto a su pequeño hijo de un mes de vida. Edwin trabaja muy duro para poder vivir mejor con su familia, y se dedica a realizar viajes turísticos por diferentes zonas del país como: balnearios, playas, lagos, centros arqueológicos y otros más. La calidad es lo que más lo distingue puesto que es muy responsable y respetuoso en todo. Edwin solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  con el fin de comprar repuestos para sus microbuses y así mismo para pagar el servicio de un mecánico, también utilizara parte del préstamo para solventar una deuda pendiente con lo que quedará libre y así invertir más en el sostenimiento de su hogar, lo que es su principal deseo.
texts.en: Edwin is thirty-two.  He lives with his wife, who works as an employee at a private company, and his one-month-old son.  He works very hard for his family to be able to live better.  He does tourist trips to different areas of the country like resorts, beaches, lakes, archeology centers, etc.  The quality of his work is what distinguishes him since he is very responsible and respectful in everything.  He is requesting a loan from Integral with the goal of buying parts for microbuses and to pay for a mechanic.  He will also use part of the loan to pay back a debt so that he can be free of it and invest more in supporting his home, which is his main goal.

loans.use: to buy parts for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Claudia María

texts.es: La falta de oportunidades es un factor social que afecta a millares de personas en nuestra sociedad, tal es el caso de Claudia María que se vio en la obligación de emigrar de su lugar de origen debido a la escasez de empleo en su tierra y buscando una oportunidad de empleo para brindarle a sus tres hijos una vida digna. Claudia hoy ve más allá y se ha propuesto crear un puesto de comida, pero para ello necesita dinero que debe invertir en la compra de alimentos para poder realizar las preparaciones. Debido a esto recurre a un préstamo con la esperanza de que por fin su vida comience a mejorar y olvidar las penurias por las que ha atravesado.
texts.en: The lack of opportunities that affects many people in our society has also affected Claudia María, who saw the need emigrate from her place of origin due to lack of jobs there.  She came looking for better job opportunities and provide her three children with dignified lives.  She opened a food stall but needs money to invest in the ingredients so she is asking for a loan in hopes of beginning a better life and forget about the obstacles she has overcome.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Nelly Elva

texts.es: Nelly trabajo de muy corta edad realizo actividades agrícolas, paralelo a sus estudios de primaria y secundaria, al culminar sus estudios en el colegio, lamentablemente no pudo seguir con estudios superiores por falta de recursos económicos, a los pocos años de terminar el colegio conoció a su actual pareja, tienen un dependiente de 3 años aun viven en una de las casas de su madre su objetivo es poder ser independientes  para esta finalidad buscan mejorar sus ingresos económicos, la familia en conjunto trabajo bastante para comprarse una parcela agrícola después de mucho esfuerzo y trabajado lograron la compra de dos parcelas agrícolas, en las que tienen plantaciones de Banano, plátano de freír y otros cultivos, sin embargo para poder seguir teniendo inversión es sus cultivos requieren de una fondos mas altos, por esta razón la pareja se aproximó a inmediaciones del CIDRE para solicitar un crédito  KIVA y así poder ampliar sus cultivos de banano.
texts.en: Nelly has worked from a very young age in agricultural activities, parallel to her primary and secondary studies.  Her studies ended with high school; unfortunately she was not able to continue with further studies due to a lack of economic resources.  A few years after finishing high school she met her current partner, with whom she has a 3-year-old dependant.  Although they live in one of her mother's houses, their goal is to be independent.  In order to achieve this they are seeking to increase their income.  The family worked together to be able to afford an agricultural plot.  After much effort they succeeded in buying two plots, on which they grow bananas, frying plantains and other crops.  However, in order to keep investing in their crops they need more funds.  For this reason the couple approached CIDRE to request a KIVA loan, and thus be able to increase their crop.

loans.use: to expand her plantain crop.

loans.name: Edgardo Antonio

texts.es: Edgardo de 49 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador quien con todo su esfuerzo a tratado de darle lo mejor a su familia, como estudios universitarios a sus dos hijos y todo lo necesario para contar con un hogar estable junto a su esposa. Edgardo posee desde hace 20 años una cerrajería ubicada en su casa de habitación, teniendo la ventaja que es la única en la zona lo que siempre lo hizo en la primera opción para todas las personas y fue de esta manera como él ha podido salir adelante. Edgardo solicita un préstamo para poder comprar cobre, martillos nuevos y otras herramientas y materia prima para elaborar su trabajo, el cual es muy estable. Para Edgardo lo principal es mantener a flote su negocio e ir mejorando contantemente tanto en su trabajo como con su familia.
texts.en: Edgardo is 49 years old, and is a hardworking man who has tried with all his might to provide the best for his family. Together with his wife, he has provided his two children with a university education and everything necessary for a stable life. For 20 years Edgardo has owned a locksmith's shop located in his house.  It has the advantage of being the only one in the neighborhood, which has always made it the first choice for people.  In this way he has been able to get ahead.  Edgardo is requesting a loan to buy copper, new hammers and other tools, and raw materials to carry out his work, which is very stable. For Edgardo the main thing is to keep his business afloat and to continue improving both his work and his family constantly.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make keys.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Nuevo Amanecer se encuentra esta formado por 10 socias que viven por la parroquia de Zhidmad en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de naturaleza, su gente es cálida y amable, trabajan en la agricultura, crianza de animales y también laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades económicas, siempre con una meta que es mejorar la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias. Aun mantienen viva su cultura y tradiciones que algún día les inculcaron.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Rosa Lastenia, forma parte del banco comunal Nuevo Amanecer hace 10 años, tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 12, 9, 6 y 3 años de edad, su primera hija está estudiando en el colegio y dos de sus hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo trabaja como cocinero en un restaurante de la ciudad, la casa en la que viven es la recompensa del trabajo conyugal.
 
La Señora Rosa Lastenia pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo pasa en casa en donde cría cerdos y gallinas, también se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar. Hace algunos años trabaja como empleada domestica y labora solo días que le llaman.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es tener una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nuevo Amanecer (New Dawn) is formed by 10 members who live in the Zhidmad parish of Cuenca, a place that is surrounded by nature. Its people are warm and kind. They work in agriculture and raising animals, and they also work in the city in a variety of economic activities, always with one goal, which is improving the economies of their households and getting their families ahead. They still keep alive their cultures and traditions which were once instilled in them.

One of the members of this group is Señora Rosa Lastenia. She has been part of the communal bank Nuevo Amanecer for 10 years. She is 32 years old. She is married and from this union has conceived 4 children, ages 12, 9, 6, and 3. Her oldest daughter is studying in secondary school and two of her children attend a little city school. Her husband works as a cook in a restaurant in the city. The house in which they live is the reward for their work as a couple.

Señora Rosa Lastenia spends the greater part of her time in her home, which she raises pigs and chickens. She also works in agriculture, and what she harvests is for consumption in her home. For some years she has worked as a domestic employee, and she works only on the days when she is called.

She is going to invest her new loan in the purchase of pigs and food for her animals.

Her goal is to have a store in her house.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Octavian

texts.es: El señor Octavian, es una persona de 45 años de edad de estado civil casado, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su propia casa, cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su hijo; la actividad económica principal a la que se dedica es la agricultura, produce papa, achojcha y choclo (maíz) en sus propios terrenos que se hallan situados en la comunidad de Conda Arriba del municipio de Pocona distante aproximadamente a unos 145 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. Asimismo el cliente en épocas de cosecha presta sus servicios de transporte de carga de hortalizas con su propio camión desde su misma comunidad a la ciudad de Cochabamba generando un ingreso económico adicional. Y finalmente el señor Octavian manifiesta tener el deseo de poder superarse y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la construcción de sus nuevas viviendas (obra fina) y de tal forma poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su dependiente.
texts.en:
Octavian is 45 years old, married, studied through primary school, lives in his own house, and has a dependent son. 

His main economic activity is agriculture, growing potatoes, achojcha [light green vegetable, slightly ribbed, and hollow] and choclo (corn) on his own land that is located in the community of Conda Arriba of the municipality of Pocona, approximately 145 km from the city of Cochabamba. Also, during harvesting season, he lends his services to transport loads of vegetables with his own truck from his community to the city of Cochabamba generating an additional income.

And finally Octavian says that he has the desire to excel and to this end he sees the necessity of asking for capital to invest for residential construction (fine workmanship) as a way to improve the quality of life for his son.

loans.use: to buy material for fine workmanship in order to finish the construction of his house

loans.name: Gatitas Group

texts.es: Gatitas son un grupo solidario pequeño pero puntual y pagador. Manuela es una de sus integrantes, una mujer trabajadora y noble de 56 años de edad, es soltera y tiene una hija de 35 años que esta casada. Manuela se dedica a la venta de milanesa de pollo empanizada. Todo comenzó cuando una sobrina de ella la impulso a iniciar su negocio, la enseño a filetearlas y rellenarlas, primero comenzó vendiendo 5 kg, después 8 y ahora vende 18 kilos por semana. Con el crédito ella va a comprar mas pechuga de pollo ya que le cuesta mucho el pedido, además de comprar queso, jamón y demás artículos para la preparación de las mismas. Su sueño es crecer y poder vender cada día mas y comenzar a llevar platillos a domicilio.
texts.en: Gatitias is a unified group that is small, but punctual with its repayments.  Manuela is one of its members.  She is a hardworking and noble woman, 56 years old, who is single and has a 35-year-old married daughter.  Manuela works selling breaded, stuffed  chicken.  It all began when one of her nieces urged her to start her own business, and taught her to filet and stuff the chicken.  She started off selling 5 kg, then 8 and now she sells 18 kg per week.  With the loan she will buy more chicken breasts because it costs a lot to order them, as well as buying cheese, ham and other items for the preparation of her product.  Her dream is to be able to sell more every day and to be able to begin home delivery of dishes.

loans.use: to buy chicken breasts, cheese, ham and other items.

loans.name: Dorance De Jesús

texts.es:
Dorance de Jesús de 39 años de edad se dedica al oficio de la cría de pollos, actividad que le brinda el sustento a el y a su familia. Le ha tocado difícil en la vida debido a que por condiciones económicas nunca pudo acceder a la educación y desde niño se vio en la obligación de trabajar para subsistir. En la actualidad cuenta con su esposa y su hijo de tres años por los que lucha para sacar adelante y poderles brindar lo que las circunstancias un día le negaron.
Su mayor sueño es poder contar con un negocio estable que le brinde la tranquilidad y la seguridad se un presente y un futuro mejor. Por tal motivo recurre a la solicitud de un préstamo que le permitirán comprar animales de engorde y realizarle mantenimiento a los corrales.
texts.en:
Dorance de Jesús, 39, makes a living raising chickens, which supports him and his family.  He has had difficulties in life: because of financial conditions he was not able to get an education, and from a young age he had to work to survive.  Currently he has his wife and three-year-old son, for whom he strives to get ahead, so he can give them what circumstances denied him.

His biggest dream is to be able to have a stable business that will give him peace of mind and security in the present and a better future.  For this reason he's requesting a loan to buy animals for fattening and to maintain the corrals.

loans.use: to buy chickens and maintain the corrals

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: La señora Hilda, es una persona de 37 años de edad, de estado civil soltera pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive actualmente en su casa propia y cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos. Las actividades económicas  que desarrolla la clienta es la producción agrícola y la crianza de pollos parrilleros; referente a la producción agrícola anualmente siembra en dos épocas de la gestión papa y achojcha en sus propios terrenos que cuentan con riego por inundación que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de Conda Arriba del municipio de Pocona que esta distante a unos 145 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Hilda manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere superarse y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la construcción de sus nuevas viviendas (obra fina) y de tal forma poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus dependientes.
texts.en: Hilda is thirty-seven and is not married, but she lives with her partner.  She studied through primary school.  She currently lives in her own home, and she has three dependents, who are her children.  She works in agriculture and raises chickens to eat.  She plants in two seasons every year to grow potatoes and "achojcha" [a gourd-like vegetable].  She plants on her own land and has a risk of flooding.  Her land is located in the Conda Arriba community of the city of Pocona, which is 145 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.  Señora Hilda says that she is a hard-working and responsible person who wants to better herself. This is why she is requsting investment capital to construct new iiving areas so she can improve the quality of life of her dependents.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish building her home.

loans.name: Abejas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Abejas que como las mismas son trabajadoras, emprendedoras y se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante, es un grupo solidario que lleva con su crédito 4 ciclos.
Ma Luisa es una mujer casada de 40 años, tiene 3 hijos de 22, 18 y 7 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos por catalogo; comenzó a vender desde hace 2 años, debido a su necesidad económica, además de que le gustan mucho las ventas, inició vendiendo 5 pares por semana y ahora vende hasta 10 pares. El crédito la ayudara para comprar mas pedidos de zapatos que tiene para la temporada invernal. A Ma Luisa le gustaría llegar a tener su propio negocio de zapatos.
texts.en: The Abejas group are hardworking like their namesake, the bee.  They are enterprising and support each other in moving forward.  They are a unified group who have been through 4 loan cycles.  Maria Luisa is 40 years old, married, and has 3 children aged 22, 18 and 7.  She works selling shoes from a catalogue.  She started doing this 2 years ago due to financial need as well as the fact that she likes sales.  She began selling 5 pairs per week, and now sells up to 10 pairs.  The loan will help her to buy more orders of shoes that she can have for her winter inventory.    Maria Luisa would like to be able to have her own shoe business.

loans.use: to buy orders of shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, instant food products, eggs, beverages, and soap

loans.name: Abdulhamid

texts.en: Abdulhamid is 61 years old, a married man, and has three children. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a tailor who sews men`s fabrics into garments. He has been operating his business for 12 years. He is smart and hard-working, and he always tries to find new ways to make an income so that he can feed his family. He applied for a loan of 250,000 YER from AMB to buy fabrics for his business. He hopes to expand his business and become a well-known tailor in his city. He appreciates Kiva for funding the previous loan. This is his second loan request posted to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to buy men`s fabrics for his business

loans.name: Edgardo Del Transito

texts.es: Edgardo del Transito de cincuenta  y siete años de edad junto a su compañera de vida Carmen y su hija en casa propia , el se dedica a la venta de ropa usada para damas, caballeros y niños,  en un puesto del mercado de la localidad donde reside, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en la venta lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; es muy conocido y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad de la ropa, los buenos precios y además por el excelente servicio; Edgardo es un hombre activo, dedicada a su labor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que solo así lograra su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa  por mayor. Edgardo del transito tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edgardo del Transito is 57 years old. He lives with his life partner and daughter in his own house. He works selling used clothing for ladies, men, and children, located at a stand at the marketplace where he lives. He has several years in the business and that has given him a lot of experience in sales that permits him to obtain better earnings. He is well known and has a lot of customers that prefer him for the quality of the clothing, the good prices and also for his excellent service.

Edgardo is an active man, dedicated to his work, eager to get ahead, and always looking for new opportunities in order to succeed. He strives to the maximum every day because he knows that this is the only way to achieve his goal. In the last few weeks the demand has increased and he wants to take advantage of it by making a new investment, and he needs capital which is why he is asking Integral for a loan that will permit him to buy clothing at wholesale prices.

Edgardo de Transito has good payment references and is responsible and is certain that he can make his payments and at the same time trusts that he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale prices to sell in his business

loans.name: Maria Maximinia

texts.es: María Maximinia sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera y sus hijos; ella posee una panadería donde vende pan francés y pan dulce pastelitos, tortas, quesadillas entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia en la elaboración de pan, gracias a eso obtiene siempre las mejores ganancias; la panadería esta ubicada en su vivienda y comercializa a diferentes zonas de la comunidad, es muy conocida por vender el pan mas delicioso y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y el excelente servicio; María se caracteriza por su amabilidad y honestidad, es una mujer dedicada ha su labor, emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante y ganarse un futuro mas prospero, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo con amor y constancia sabe que solo así obtendrá el éxito que tanto desea, últimamente aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima harina por mayor, azúcar, leche, huevos, dulce, etc. María Maximina tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Maximinia, 64, lives with her partner and children. She own a bakery where she sells among other things french bread, pastries, cakes and quesadillas. She has owned the business for some time now and has gained a lot of experience as a baker. Thanks to this she is always able to profit. 

The bakery is located in her home and she sells to several different areas in the community. She is well known for selling the most delicious bread and has a large clientele due to her quality, good prices and excellent service. 

Maria is known for her friendliness and honesty. She is a woman dedicated to her work and an entrepreneur who is eager to succeed and have a more prosperous future. Every day she tries her hardest. She knows that love and consistency is the only way to gain the success she wants. 

Recently there has been an increase in demand and she wants to take advantage and make a new investment. This is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy ingredients such as wholesale flour, sugar, milk, eggs, candy etc. 

María Maximinia has a good history of payments and is very responsible. She assures that she will be able to pay back the loan and trusts that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, sugar, milk, eggs, candy.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar de 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar. Oscar ha trabajado toda su vida como panadero y fue hace 25 años que pudo realizar su sueño de contar con una panadería propia con la cual contara con una vida mejor junto a su núcleo familiar. Oscar realiza diferentes tipos de pan, tanto dulce como salado su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan y es así como logran salir a tiempo con todos sus pedidos, ya que para Oscar la responsabilidad es vital en el negocio para que todo vaya bien. Oscar solicita un préstamo con el propósito de invertir en la panadería comprando: latas, moldes, cucharada y tazas medidoras, harina, azúcar, manteca, miel, frutas y otros materiales principales para elaborar más pan, lo que le permitirá contar con más ingresos, lo que es de mucho beneficio para Oscar.
texts.en:
Oscar is 57 years old.  He lives together with his wife and two children who are studying.  Oscar has worked all his life as a baker and it was 25 years ago that he could make real his dream of having his own bakery through which he could create a better life together with his immediate family.

Oscar makes breads of different types, both sweet and savory.  His wife and children help him and in this way they can finish all their orders on time, since for Oscar responsibility is vital in business so that all goes well.

Oscar is requesting a loan with the purpose of investing in the bakery by buying cans, molds, measuring spoons and cups, flour, sugar, shortening, honey, fruits and other ingredients to make more bread.  This will allow him to have more income, which will be a big help to Oscar.

loans.use: to buy molds and ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Sandra Del Rosario

texts.es: Sandra del Rosario vive junto a su hija; ella posee una venta de productos nutricionales como vitaminas, café medicinal entre otros tiene varios años con la labor y comercia de forma ambulante, tiene tres años con este negocio y ha adquirido muy buena experiencia que le permite obtener siempre excelentes ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela y la prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y sobre todo con un servicio inigualable; Sandra es una mujer humilde, decidida, dedicada a su labor y entregada a sus sueños, dia a dia se esfuerza por lograr un futuro prospero, su mas grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito que tanto desea es la constancia y el amor a su trabajo, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión, pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita productos nutricionales. Sandra del Rosario tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable esta feliz con la ayuda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Sandra del Rosario lives together with her daughter.  She owns a business selling nutritional products like vitamins and medicinal coffee, among others.  She has worked various years in this work and she does it in the informal sector.  She has three years in this business and has acquired very good experience that allows her to always get good earnings.  She has created a large clientele and they shop with her because everything she sells is of the best quality, at accessible prices and above all with incomparable service.

Sandra is a humble woman, decisive, dedicated to her work and devoted to her dreams.  Day by day she works to achieve a prosperous future.  Her biggest secret to achieve the success that she desires is the constancy for and love of her work.  Like all good salespeople, she wants to grow the business and make more investments, but to do this she needs capital and for that reason she is requesting from INTEGRAL a loan that will allow her to purchase nutritional products.  

Sandra de Rosario has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is happy for the help, and she promises to pay the debt and at the same time is confident that she will be able to carry her home to economic security.

loans.use: to buy nutritional products.

loans.name: Irma Guadalupe

texts.es: Irma de 57 años de edad, es muy responsable y trabajadora, y cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos. Ella vive junto a su esposo y su madre de avanzada edad. Irma trabaja muy duro vendiendo ropa de forma ambulante, así  mismo pone una pequeña venta a las afueras de su casa, con el fin de poder contar con más ingresos también vende panes, agua embotellada y otras bebidas en la cancha de su lugar de vivienda donde todos los domingos en la mañana y las tarde les vende estos productos a los aficionados de este deporte. Irma siempre ha sido muy trabajadora por lo que es muy estimada en la zona que reside. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar ropa para hombres y mujeres en gran variedad, así mismo para invertir en la materia prima de los panes que elabora y así mismo para comprar más bebidas. Con esto Irma espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Irma, 57, is very responsible and hardworking, and has very good references from her neighbors and acquaintances.  She lives with her husband and her mother, who's of an advanced age.

Irma works very hard selling clothing as a street vendor.  She also set up a small store outside her house with the goal of having more income.  She also sells bread, bottled water, and other beverages in the sports field in her neighborhood, where every Sunday morning and afternoon she sells these products to the fans.  Irma always has been very hardworking, for which she is well respected in the area where she lives.

She's asking Integral for a loan to be able to buy a wide variety of men's and women's clothing as well as to invest in the ingredients for the bread she makes and to buy more beverages.  Irma hopes to improve her profits this way.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yanira de 45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, para poder ayudar con los gastos del hogar, Yanira se dedica a la elaboración de sopa de para los días jueves y fines de semana, esta sopa es un platillo típico del país que esta elaborada de pata de res, verduras, especias y otros ingredientes más, y debido a su delicioso sabor es muy solicitada y vendida a buen precio ya que no todas las personas la pueden elaborar. Para poder mejorar sus ganancias Yanira solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y así poder comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima la cual es mucha, y así mismo para mejorar su negocio y percibir mayores ganancias ella desea comprar bebidas para comercializar junto a la sopa, lo que le dará un mejor detalle y aumentara sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Yanira, 45 years old, lives with her husband who works as a mason. In order to be able to help with the household expenses, Yanira works making soup Thursdays through Sundays. The soup is a typical dish of the country that is made of cow feet, vegetables, spices and other ingredients, and because of its delicious flavor it is in great demand and sold at a good price because not everyone can make it.

To be able to improve her income Yanira is asking for a loan from Integral, so she can buy amounts of prime materials at wholesale which is a lot, which will improve her business and earn higher earnings and she wants to buy beverages to sell with her soup, which will offer a better presentation and will increase her income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in order to make a typical soup of El Salvador which she sells from Thursdays through Sundays.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es: María de 42  años de edad, es una madre soltera de una joven de 14 años, ella es una madre responsable y trabajadora quien mira por el bien de su hogar. María se dedica a la venta de cocos en una calle de mucho comercio y transito de personas ya que esta cerca del mercado municipal de la zona. María ha vendido coco por muchos años lo que la ha hecho muy conocida por lo que cuenta con varios clientes fijos quienes cada fin de semana y cada oportunidad que tienen le compran cocos. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar mayor cantidad de cocos, así mismo para comprar bolsas plásticas para colocar el agua de coco, pajillas y otras herramientas que utiliza para abrir los cocos. María tiene el deseo de mejorar en gran medida sus ganancias lo cual podrá lograr gracias a este préstamo.
texts.en: María is forty-two and is the single mother of a fourteen-year-old girl.  She is a responsible and hard-working mother who looks after the well-being of her home.  María makes a living by selling coconuts on a street with a lot of business activity and food traffic, since it is near the city market in the area.  María has sold coconuts for many years, which has made her well-known, so she has several fixed customers that buy from her every weekend and every opportunity that they can.  She is requesting a loan from Integral to be able to buy a larger quantity of coconuts.  She will also buy plastic bags to put coconut water in, straws, and other tools that she will use to open the coconuts.  María hopes to improve her profits greatly, which she will be able to do, thanks to this loan.

loans.use: to buy coconuts to sell their water.

loans.name: Vilma Aracely

texts.es: Vilma de 25 años de edad, vive junto a su pequeña hija de 3 años y junto a su madre, con quien trabajan muy duro para sostener el hogar y contar con todo lo necesario para vivir. Vilma posee una venta de zapatos y sandalias en diferentes colores, estilos y tallas, tanto para hombres como para mujeres, actualmente su negocio ha ido creciendo de manera que provee a tres personas con estos productos para que vendan de forma ambulante. Vilma posee su negocio en el mercado del lugar que reside pero pronto se mudará a un local propio, por lo que necesita contar con más mercadería. Es por esta razón que Vilma solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma comprar mayor cantidad de sandalias y así contar con más productos para incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Vilma is 25 years old. She lives with her young 3 year old daughter and her mother. They work very hard in order to maintain the home and have everything they need to live.

Vilma has a business selling shoes and sandals in different colors, styles and sizes, for both men and  women. Currently her business has grown so that three people are working as traveling sales people.

Vilma has her business at the market where she lives, but soon she will move to her facility, which is why she needs more merchandise. This is the reason that Vilma is asking for a loan through Integral, so she can buy a wider variety of sandals and thus to have more products in order to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy sandals to sell in her business

loans.name: Karla Virginia

texts.es: Karla de 31 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos menores de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar. Con el fin de poder contar con una mejor vida y de este modo brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo. Karla se dedica a la venta de zapatos y sandalias para niños, hombres y mujeres, las cuales comercializa desde su casa de habitación, lo que le da grandes ventajas como estar junto a sus hijos. El negocio esta ubicado cerca de la alcaldía municipal de su pueblo por lo que es una calle muy concurrida, siendo un gran beneficio para ella. Con el fin de aprovechar la temporada de fin de año que es cuando las ventas incrementan, Karla solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de sandalias y de esta forma mejorar sus ventas y así mismo su negocio.
texts.en: Karla is 31 years old and lives with her husband and three minor children who attend school.  Karla sells men’s, women’s and children’s shoes and sandals out of her home in order to help her husband provide a better life.  Working out of the home provides great advantages, such as allowing her to be with her children.  The business is located near the city hall on a very well-travelled street, which is good for her.  Karla is asking INTEGRAL for loan so that she can take advantage of the end of the year when her sales increase.  She will use the money to buy sandals in quantity and in this way be able to improve her sales and her business.

loans.use: to buy sandals.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es: María Jesús vive junto a sus seis hijos en casa propia; ella posee una tortillería desde hace ya varios años, el trabajo le ha regalado gran experiencia en la elaboración y venta de tortillas y eso le ayuda a obtener siempre las mejores ganancias además por las tardes para complementar los gastos del hogar siempre realiza una venta de antojitos típicos, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda en una zona muy transitada de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela y la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de calidad, a precio accesible y además con un servicio excelente; María  se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad y honestidad, es una mujer ejemplar, emprendedora y  dedicada a su labor siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le abran camino al éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero para ello necesita de capital, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, frijoles, carnes, verduras etc. María Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy satisfecha con la colaboración, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Jesús lives with her six children in a home of her own.  She has had a tortilla factory for several years and she has learned a lot about tortilla making and this has helped her increase her income.  In the evenings she also sells typical snacks.  Her business is located in her home in a zone through which many people transition.  She already has many customers and they prefer to do business with her because she only sells quality items for good prices and gives good service.

María is known for being friendly and honest.  She is an exemplary, enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and always seeking new opportunities for success.  Her demand has increased in recent weeks and she wants to take advantage and make an investment but needs working capital.  She is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn in quantity, beans, meats, vegetables, etc.

María Jesús has a good payment history and is very responsible.  She feels very satisfied with the cooperation and assures us that she will repay her debt.  She also hopes to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Rakan Group

texts.en:
This group is called Rakan and consists of four ladies. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. All of them are responsible and honored to get a better life for their families. They requested a loan of 200,000 YER. 

Awatf is 35 years old and is married with one child. She lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She works untiringly to provide sustenance for her family. Her business is perfumes, incense, etc. which she uses to work for ladies. She would like to improve her business and stock more merchandise to sell and be able to increase her earnings. She is now borrowing a youth loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes, incense, etc. to sell to her customers. She hopes to enroll her child in private school.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, incense, etc. for resale

loans.name: Leana Maria

texts.es: Leana María de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en el lugar de su residencia, tiene varios años de trabajar con el pequeño negocio y ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite agilizar la producción de tortillas, gracias al buen manejo de la venta siempre obtiene las mejores ganancias, la comunidad donde vive es muy transitada y ya tiene mucha clientela, aunque sus mejores clientes son los vecinos, todo la prefieren porque su producto es de calidad, a un precio accesible y sobre todo con el servicio mas rápido del lugar; Leana es una mujer activa, decidida y muy dedicada a su labor, desea salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños por eso todos los días se esfuerza al máximo en el trabajo pues sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito que tanto espera, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda debido a la temporada y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, carbón etc. Leana María tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Leana Maria is sixty-four years old and lives with her children in her own house.  She works selling tortillas from her home.  She has had this small business for several years, and had gained valuable experience that allows her to speed up her tortilla production.  Due to her good sales management she has always been able to obtain maximum profits.  The community where she lives is very busy and she has many customers, although her best customers are her neighbors.  Everyone prefers her because her products are of good quality, at an accessible price, and above all with the fastest service around. Leana is an active and determined woman who is very dedicated to her work. She wants to get ahead and to achieve her dreams, so she exerts the maximum effort every day in her work, because she knows that this is the only way to achieve the success she wants so badly.  In the past few weeks the demand for her product has increased due to the season, and she wants to take advantage of this with a new investment.  However, she does not have enough capital to do so.  For this reason she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale corn, firewood and coal, etc.  Leana Maria has good payment references and is very responsible.  She promises that she will be able to repay the debt and at the same time has faith that it will bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, firewood and coal

loans.name: Evelyn Yanira

texts.es: Evelyn Yanira  de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, lechuga, tomate, chile, zanahoria, rábano, pepino, plátano, naranja entre otros, tiene varios años con el trabajo y se ha hecho de experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su puesto esta ubicado en el mercado de la alcaldía de la comunidad donde reside ya tiene mucha clientela fija,  pues es muy conocida y las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan, con producto de calidad ya precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Evelyn es una mujer activa, dedica a su labor y con muchas metas por delante, todos los días trabaja muy duro por alcanzarlos sabe que solo así logrará el éxito; como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero para ello necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fruta y verdura por mayor; Evelyn Yanira tiene buena referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Evelyn Yanira, 34, lives with her three children. She works selling fruits and vegetables, lettuce, tomatoes, peppers, carrots, radishes, cucumbers, bananas, and oranges among other things. She has been doing this work for several years and they experience has allowed her to improve her earnings. Her stand is located in the city hall market in the community where she lives. She has several regular customers, because she is very well known and people prefer her because she always has what they need, with quality products and accessible prices, in addition to excellent service. Evelyn is an active women, dedicated to her work, and with many goals in front of her. Every day she works very hard to reach them. She knows that that is the only way she can be successful. Like all good shopkeepers, she wants to expand her business and make a new investment. But she doesn't have the capital that she needs. This is why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale. Evelyn Yanira has good payment references and she is very responsible. She is sure she will be able to pay off the loan and she is also confident that it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Regina Esmeralda

texts.es: Regina Esmeralda de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de calzado sandalias, zapatillas, tenis entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la venta que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia en una zona muy transitada de personas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Regina es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le  ayuden a alcanzar el éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar calzado por mayor. Regina Esmeralda tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Regina Esmeralda, 48, lives with her life partner and her children in her own house.  She makes a living selling footwear: sandals, slippers, and tennis shoes, among other types.  She has several years of experience in the business and has acquired a lot of experience in sales, which allows her to earn the best profits.  She sells in a very busy pedestrian area and has a lot of customers who prefer her for the quality, good prices, and, above all, excellent service.

Regina is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her job and very much wants to get ahead.  She's always ready for new opportunities that will help her be successful.  Demand for her product has increased in the last few weeks and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment.

This is why she's asking Integral for a loan to buy more footwear wholesale.

Regina Esmeralda has a good payment record and is very responsible.  She's certain she'll be able to repay the debt and also has faith that she'll bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy footwear wholesale

loans.name: Frasht Al-Rabia Group

texts.en:
This group is called Frasht Al-Rabia, which consists of 4 ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB.

Sumia is a 32-year-old, married woman. She has three children and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. Her educational background is secondary school. She is a clever woman so she has requested a loan of 50,000 YER to buy a computer. Her goal is to own a project for selling computers.

loans.use: to buy a computer for personal use.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Linsay

texts.es:
Linsay es una mujer de 33 años de edad, casada y con dos hijos. Vivía en España y debido a la difícil situación por la que atraviesa el país se vio en la obligación de retornar a Colombia su país de origen. 
En búsqueda de un empleo como medio de sostenimiento para ella y familia, decidió en conjunto con su esposo alquilar unas máquinas de coser para confeccionar ropa y generar ingresos para su hogar. Hoy está en búsqueda de un crédito que le permita comprar las máquinas para mejorar su situación económica y ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Su mayor anhelo es poder montar una gran empresa pero sabe que eso lleva su tiempo y que lo más importante es empezar a construir ese sueño.
texts.en:
Linsay is a 33-year-old woman. She is married with two children. She lived in Spain and due to the difficult situation in Spain she had to return to Columbia her native country. In order to seek means of supporting her family, she decided with her husband rent sewing machines to make clothing to generate income. 

Currently, she is seeking a loan to purchase sewing machines to improve her economic situation and offer her children a better quality of life. Her biggest wish is to have a strong business, but she knows that it takes time. The most important thing is to start to build her dream.

loans.use: to purchase sewing machines

loans.name: María Yuri

texts.es: Yuri es madre soltera de un pequeño de 15 meses. Su labor como madre y ama de casa no le ha permitido buscar un empleo estable, por lo que ha recurrido vender dulces en su casa, ubicando es su pequeña sala su nuevo proyecto de negocio. Yuri cree que por vivir en una vereda y no tener competencia cercana, su negocio le dará buenos resultados, pero su gran inconveniente es la falta de recursos para invertir en su tienda, por lo cual solicita un préstamo con el que comprará surtido y realizará unas adecuaciones al mismo. Su mayor sueño es ver crecer a su hijo y poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Yuri is a single mother with a 15-month-old child. Her work as a mother and homemaker has not allowed her to seek stable employment. This is why she is selling sweets in her home, setting up her new business project in her small living room. Yuri believes that by being located on a main walkway and not having competition nearby, her business will bring her good results. But her big problem is the lack of resources to invest in her store. This is why she is applying for a loan, with which she will buy stock and make some improvements. Her greatest dream is to see her son grow and be able to offer him a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock for and make some improvements to her business.

loans.name: German

texts.es: El Sr. Germán, tiene estudios hasta el bachillerato , trabaja como taxista desde  mas de 11 años, es soltero  y vive con sus  padres, durante los últimos meses su madre sufrió un accidente en el cual tuvo que ser amputada sus dos piernas de esta  manera afectando considerablemente  a su economía del titular, pero aun bajo estas circunstancias el Sr. Germán pudo asumir las responsabilidades que tiene y que las mismas están siendo canceladas, su madre al estar postrada en cama tuvo que llegar  a ser dependiente  de los ingresos  de su  hijo Germán el cual aporta en gran manera para el sustento de la casa y los medicamentos de su madre la cual aun esta en proceso de recuperación y necesita de muchos medicamentos y cuidados, el  Sr. Germán se presto  dinero para cubrir todos los gatos médicos pero le cobran interés muy alto y él quiere cancelar esta deuda con el presente préstamo.
texts.en: Germán studied up through high school. He has worked as a taxi driver for more than 11 years. He is single and lives with his parents. In recent months, his mother had an accident that led to the amputation of both her legs. This affected their economic situation considerably. But even under these circumstances, Germán was able to take on the responsibilities and these are being taken care of. His mother, being in bed, became dependent on her son's income. Germán gives her a lot of support for the upkeep of the house and for her medicines. She is still recovering and needs a lot of medicines and care. Germán borrowed money to cover the medical expenses but the interest rate is very high and he wants to pay off this debt with the present loan.

loans.use: to pay off his debt (for the purchase of medicine)

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Pedro Antonio de 62 años de edad, se ha convertido en el mayor ejemplo para sus hijos, pues tras haber perdido su empleo hace 16 años, decidió seguir adelante porque tenía claro que el bienestar de su familia era lo más importante. Le hizo frente a la vida y se convirtió en un gran empresario, compró una carreta en la que vende legumbres recorriendo las calles de su localidad. Cada día se levanta temprano para ir a comprar la venta del día y luego se dirige a comenzar su faena. Su gran sueño es poder estar al lado de su familia y velar por ella. Actualmente su carreta presenta deterioro por lo cual anda en búsqueda de un crédito que le permita realizarle los arreglos correspondientes y comprar más surtido para ofrecerle variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pedro Antonio is 62-years-old, he has been a good example for his children. After loosing his job 16 years ago, he decided to keep going on because he knew that the wellbeing of his family was the most important thing. He faced life and became a great entrepreneur. He bought the vegetable cart and sells along the streets in his neighborhood. Everyday he wakes up early to purchase the products to sell and then he goes to start his job. 

His great dream is to be alongside his family and watch after them. Currently, his cart is deteriorated. For this reason he seeks a loan to complete the maintenance and to purchase more supplies to offer a variety to his clients.

loans.use: to repair his cart and purchase supplies

loans.name: Wilson De Jesús

texts.es: Wilson de 44 años de edad, aprendió el oficio de peluquería, tras buscar empleo y no conseguirlo. Cansado y necesitado por mejorar su condición económica se dedicó a este oficio el cual ha sido su único medio para ganarse el pan de cada día. Wilson tiene una gran necesidad; comprar algunas herramientas de trabajo que le ha exigido la Secretaría de Salud de la ciudad, de no adquirirlas se verá en la obligación de cerrar el negocio, ya que es una exigencia de la misma. Wilson teme perder su única fuente de empleo y por ello ha recurrido a solicitar un préstamo para comprar las  herramientas de trabajo y de paso invertir en surtido.
texts.en: Wilson, who is 44 years old, learned the trade of hairdressing after looking for work and not finding it. Tired and needing to improve his economic condition, he dedicated himself to this job, which has been his only way of earning his daily bread. Wilson has one great need: to purchase some work tools that the city’s Secretary of Health has required. If he doesn’t obtain them, he will be obligated to close the business, as they are a requirement for it. Wilson is afraid of losing his only source of employment, and because of this, he has resorted to requesting a loan in order to purchase the work tools and in doing so, to invest in supplies.

loans.use: to purchase tools for working and general restocking.

loans.name: Wendy Patricia

texts.es:
Wendy tiene 27 años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija.  Ella ha tenido una vida muy difícil, ha luchado por sacar adelante a su hija. Siempre ha contado con el apoyo de sus padres. Durante tres años trabajo en un restaurante en la comunidad donde vive; actualmente trabaja con una ONG´S desde hace un año se encarga de trabajar con las familias rurales de la comunidad. En su infancia ella estudiaba y realizaba los oficios domésticos en su hogar.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar adobe, madera y pago de mano de obra, para iniciar con la construcción de su vivienda, debido a que sus padres le han heredado el terreno para que construya su casa. Su deseo, es vivir en una casa digna y propia junto con su hija.
texts.en:
Wendy is 27 years old and the single mother of one daughter. She has had a very difficult life and has struggled to get by with her daughter. She has always had support from her parents. For three years, she worked in a restaurant in the community where she lives. Currently, she has worked for an NGO for one year. Her job is working with rural families in her community. In her childhood, she went to school and did domestic chores in her household. 

The loan she is requesting from the Campo Foundation is to buy adobe and wood, and to pay for labor, so that she can start the construction of her home, since her parents have passed a plot of land on to her so she can build a house. Her desire is to live in a house of her own, with adequate living conditions, together with her daughter.

loans.use: to buy adobe and wood and to pay for labor to start constructing her house.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa María de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, leche, pan, jabones, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda esta ubicada en su vivienda en una comunidad muy transitada de personas , ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque es la tienda mas surtida con productos de calidad, a muy buenos precios y además con un servicio excelente; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora, activa, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le abran camino al éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Rosa María  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable se siente muy agradecida con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa María, 28, lives with her life partner. She has a store where she sells basic products, basic grains, milk, bread, and soaps, among other things. She has been in this business for several years and she has a lot of experience which allows her to get better earnings. The store is located in her home in a very well-traveled community. She has a lot of customers; people prefer her because the store is stocked with quality products at good prices, and the service is also excellent. 

Rosa is an enterprising and active woman who is dedicated to her work, and has a lot of desire to move forward. She is always waiting for new opportunities that will lead to success. Like all good shopkeepers, she wants to expand her business, but she needs a new investment.This is why she is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy basic grains, candies, instant products, drinks, soaps, etc. Roda María has good payment references and is very responsible. She is very grateful for the help. She is sure she will be able to pay off the loan and is also confident that it will giver her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candies, instant products, drinks, and soaps.

loans.name: Drande

texts.en:
Drande, this well-respected lady in her community, is in her fifties, is married and has one child. She has been working very hard these past 15 years in her business and has been the only one to support her family financially, she said. She thanks God for all the strength and the opportunity to provide for her family she has been given. 

Drande’s activity has been mainly in agriculture and grape vines. She owns land where she’s been planting grains, potatoes, veggies and of course grape vines. During the last years, she has seen progress in the grape vine business because many locals and businesses in her region buy grapes to make wine.

Drande will start growing this business in the near future, yet, at the moment she is in need of 200,000 Albanian Lek to build an irrigation system and buy supports for the vines.  This is the reason why she is requesting a loan through Kiva and hopes that lenders will show their generosity.

loans.use: To build an irrigation system and buy supports for the vines

loans.name: Inti Pakareq Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INTI PAKAREQ”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mónica ella es soltera y tiene 45 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agencia de viajes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de paquetes turísticos como tours al Valle Sagrado,Machupicchu,Camino Inca,City Tours entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa ,la socia distribuye su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades ,familiares entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que  la socia saca adelante  a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de boletos turísticos para su agencia.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de carpinteria, venta de bisutería, tejidos a base de máquina, venta de platería, lavandería, venta de cosméticos.

Las personas que salen en la foto adjunta son socias que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “Inti Pakareq.” This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco, and the department of Cusco.

Mónica, a member, is single, 45 years old, and has one son. She alternates her daily activities with a travel agency business. She sells different types of tour packages such as tours to Valle Sagrado, Machu Picchu, Camino Inca, and city tours among others.

She has a good time working in her business which is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts in each day to the business. She also works buying and selling clothing. She distributes her merchandise to her customers who ask such as friends, family members and others. She is a responsible and earnest person and this is how she has gotten her family ahead. She is asking for a loan in order to buy tourist tickets for her agency. 

The other members work in the business of carpentry, selling costume jewelry, machine based textiles, selling silverware, laundry, cosmetic sales.

The people left out of the photograph are members who asked for permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work related reasons.

The member is grateful to those that are a part of this dream through this medium and she promises to make her payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy tourist tickets for her travel agency.

loans.name: Bandr

texts.en:
Bandr is a 35-year-old man. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a father of six children. Bandr`s business is a grocery store that he started many years ago with limited capital. It is the main source of income for feeding his family. 

Though he has been working hard, he can`t meet his customers' requirements due to limited capital as wholesalers require cash payment to provide him grocery supplies. He managed to attract more clients. He was happy about attracting new clients but on the other hand, the financial challenge of meeting customers' demand is hindering his business progress and growth.
