So, he took out a loan of 350,000 YER in order to purchase grocery supplies that his shop needs.

loans.use: to purchase grocery supplies for resale.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: El señor Freddy tiene 42 años, es una persona humilde y trabajadora, vivió junto a sus padres, los cuales le colaboraron con sus estudios, estudio la carrera Agronomía, pero no ejerce su profesión debido a que no tenia buenos ingresos de esa actividad, esta casado con la Sra. Elizabeth, con la cual tienen 3 hijos pequeños dependientes que estudian en el nivel primario, actualmente viven en una casa en anticrético en la Zona de la Coronilla del Cercado de Cochabamba - Bolivia, esta zona se caracteriza por ser peligrosa, pero es la única zona donde el cliente tiene la capacidad de poder pagar el anticrético. Actualmente el cliente tiene su Gomería donde trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 am - 18:00 pm. Como actividad secundaria tiene la venta de lubricantes; El crédito solicitado es para la compra de lubricantes para su actividad secundaria, esto le permitirá al cliente tener mejores ingresos y así en futuro ahorrar para buscar un mejor lugar para vivir.
texts.en: Freddy is 42 years old. He is a humble and hard-working person. He lived with his parents, who supported him with his studies. He studied Agronomy, but he is not working in his professional field because he did not have a good income from that activity. He is married to Elizabeth, with whom he has 3 small dependent children, who are in primary school. They currently live in a house in an anticrético [a legal arrangement in Bolivia whereby the tenant provides a loan to the landlord in lieu of rent] in the Coronilla zone of Cercado de Cochabamba, Bolivia. This zone is known for being dangerous, but it is the only area where he is able to pay the anticrético. Currently, the borrower operates a tire repair shop, where he works from Monday through Saturday from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. As a secondary activity he sells lubricants. The loan he is requesting is to buy lubricants for his secondary activity. This will permit him to have a better income and thus save up in the future to look for a better place to live.

loans.use: to buy lubricants to sell.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es:
José tiene 53 años de edad, es casado y tiene 6 hijos. Él trabaja muy fuerte con el apoyo de su esposa y de sus hijos, en la elaboración de hamacas de seda. Proceso que heredo de sus padres desde que tenia 15 años de edad, además trabaja en la agricultura sembrando maíz y fríjol. Cuando se caso, empezó su propio negocio de elaboración de hamacas en la cual pone todo su empeño y dedicación; para obtener ingresos económicos que le ayuden al sostenimiento de su familia.

La mercadería la vende en las plazas de la ciudad y en los alrededores de la comunidad en donde vive don José. Para comprar los insumos que necesita para elaborar las hamacas, tiene que viajar a la ciudad, se traslada en transporte publico, este viaje lo realiza cada 15 a 22 días y se tarda cuarenta y cinco minutos en llegar.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar más insumos para elaborar las hamacas, debido a que es en esta temporada en donde vende más y también elabora manguillos. Su deseo, es instalar un puesto en donde pueda vender las hamacas; con la finalidad de ahorrar para realizarles mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
José, 53, is married and has six children.  He works very hard with the support of his wife and children in making silk hammocks, a process he learned from his parents at the age of 15.  He also works in agriculture growing corn and beans.  When he got married he started his own business making hammocks.  He puts all his effort and dedication into this so he has an income to help support his family.

José sells the merchandise in the plazas of the city and on the outskirts of the city where he lives.  He has to go to the city on public transportation to buy the supplies he needs to make the hammocks.  He makes the trip every two or three weeks, and it takes him 45 minutes to get there.

The loan he's requesting of Fundación Campo is to buy more supplies to make the hammocks, because he sells more in this season.  He also makes straps.  He wants to set up a stall where he can sell the hammocks.  His goal is to save money so he can make improvements on his home.

loans.use: to buy more supplies to make hammocks

loans.name: Rahab

texts.en:
Rahab lives in the Kongowea area of Coast province, Kenya. She is a married business lady who owns a retail shop which she has been operating for five years. In this business, Rahab sells bread, soft drinks, milk, utensils, etc. She also sells charcoal and owns rental houses. Rahab is a mother of two school-going children.

Rahab learnt about Milango through a friend and joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve business operations. The challenges she is facing are price fluctuations and bad debts. 

Rahab is applying for a loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to buy retail stock, e.g., soap, sugar, plastic utensils, etc. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to expand the business. Her plans for the future are to start a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy retail stock, e.g., soap, sugar, plastic utensils, etc.

loans.name: Anagil

texts.es:
La señora Anagil tiene 36 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos de 19, 17 y 15 años de edad respectivamente. Se dedica  a la siembra de granos básico como maíz y frijol, ella cultiva varios ciclos en el año de primera y de segunda que son los ciclos productivos de la estación lluviosa en El Salvador, también cultiva milpa de chagüite, ya que donde ella vive pasa el rio y ella hace retención del agua para regar la milpa. Esta actividad la realiza con la ayuda de su esposo tienen mas de 10 hacer de ejercer esta actividad. 

Los insumas agrícolas que necesita para la siembra de los granos básicos las compras en agro-servicios de la ciudad , que se encuentra a una distancia de 2 kilómetros desde su casa de habitación. 

El financiamiento será invertido en compra de Semilla me mejorada, Fertilizantes, Abono, Control de plagas y malezas para que el cultivo no se dañe, Pago de arrendamiento de la tierra, Pago de mano de obra, Entre otros.

La principal necesidad que será satisfecha con el préstamo es la siembra de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz ya que la tierra se encuentra preparada y con la mano de obra dispuesta para ejercer la actividad. También,estará forjando el futuro de la familia ya que se podrá contar con otros ingresos que serán de mucha ayuda. Pues,  con la venta del maíz contara con ingresos para el sustento de la familia de esta manera la calidad de vida será mucho mejor que la actual.   

Sus  planes a futuro según sea el ingreso de la venta del maíz es la compra de 7,000 metros cuadrados de terreno para la siembra de los granos básicos. Ella ya no quiere andar alquilando la tierra. Porque en años pasados le ha costado que los colonos le alquilen la tierra por que ya se las han prometido a otras personas.
texts.en:
Anagil, 36, is married and has three children, ages 19, 17, and 15. She works sowing basic grains like corn and beans. She grows during several cycles throughout the year. The first and second cycles are the productive cycles during the rainy season in El Salvador. She also has flooded fields, since the river passes through the area where she lives and she retains the water to irrigate the fields. She does this with the help of her husband. They have been doing this activity for more than 10 years. She buys the agricultural supplies that she needs for the planting in an agricultural services store in the city, which is two kilometers from her home. The loan will be invested the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest and weed control so that the crop isn't damaged, lease payments on the land, and payment of laborers, among other things.

The main need that will be met with the loan is the planting of 7,000 square meters of corn, because the land is ready and they have the workers ready to carry it out. She is also forging the family's future since they will have a higher income that will help out a lot. With the sale of the corn, she will have the income to maintain the family and this way their quality of life will be much better than it is not. Her plan for the future (depending on how the sale of the corn goes) is to purchase 7,000 square meters of land to plant basic grains. She doesn't want to rent land anymore, because in past years it has been costly to rent the land because the landowners already promised it to other people.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest and weed control so that the crops are not damaged, and to cover lease payments for the land, payment for workers, among other things.

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en:
Heang, a 54-year-old mother of five children, lives in Thmor Koul district of Cambodia.  She is a local farmer who has supported her husband in order to plant rice on one hectare of farmland as the primary source of income.  With seven years of experience with the current business, she is able to earn about 6,800 KHR per day. 

Heang wants to start up a new business, pig-raising, in order to generate more income.  However, her working capital is not sufficient for supporting this business.  Therefore, she forms a group of two as first-time borrower to apply for a new loan with VisionFund.  She is seeking a 300,000 KHR loan while her co-member is seeking a loan for 200,000 KHR. 

As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy a pig for raising.  She hopes to fatten her pig in a healthy condition so as she can earn more income to enlarge this new business.

loans.use: To buy a pig for raising

loans.name: Al-Khaldy Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-khaldy, which consists of six ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. Asia is the leader of this group. She is 40 years old, married, and has eight children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. She is a housewife who works hard to give her children a good life. 

Asia is applying for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB. She will use this portion of her group's loan to purchase construction supplies for her house. She hopes to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies for her house.

loans.name: Claudia Marilyn

texts.es: Claudia Marilyn vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos; ella posee una venta de artículos varios juguetes y dulces tradicionales de coco, leche, tamarindo entre otros, lo vende desde un pequeño puesto que posee y de forma ambulante, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las ganancias esperadas, últimamente se ha hecho de muchas más clientela pues todo el producto que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, la amabilidad ante todo; Claudia es una mujer muy laboriosa , le gusta luchar por sus sueños, piensa que la persona no se puede poner ningún límite, porque  no hay nada imposible si se trabaja duro, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar juguetes y dulces tradicionales. Claudia Marilyn tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente satisfecha con la ayuda y asegura poder cancelar la deuda pues sabe que tiene excelentes niveles de venta, además tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia Marilyn lives with her life partner and her three children.  She has a business selling various articles: toys and traditional candy made of coconut, caramel, tamarind, and other flavors.  She sells it from a little stall she has and as a street vendor.  She has had the business for several years, which has given her a lot of experience in sales, allowing her to earn the expected profits.  Lately she has acquired many more customers because the product she sells is top quality and she sells it at very reasonable prices; in addition, her service is unequaled, especially her kindness.

Claudia is a very hardworking woman.  She likes to strive for her dreams.  She thinks a person cannot have limits because nothing is impossible if you work hard.

This is why she decided to ask Integral for a loan to buy toys and traditional candy.

Claudia Marilyn has good credit references and is very responsible.  She's satisfied with the help and is certain she'll be able to repay the debt because she knows she has excellent sales levels.  She also hopes that this way she'll be able to bring financial security to her household and a better life to her family.

loans.use: to buy toys and traditional candy

loans.name: Munh-Erdene

texts.en:
Mr. Munh-Erdene is 26 years old. He lives with his wife and two children in a ger (a Mongolian housing tent) in the Arhangai province of Mongolia. His wife, Naranchimeg, 26, stays at home with her younger son, Lhamjav, age 1. His daughter, Mongonchimeg, 6, is a primary school student. 

He has been operating a clothes retail business since 2008. He has planned to expand his business to increase the family income since he and his wife had a baby and family expenses increased. He is now requesting a 3,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) loan to purchase clothes from China and sell them in his rental counter at the local market. He is an honest, responsible and hardworking man.

loans.use: to purchase clothes from China and sell them in his rental counter at the local market.

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en: Ahmed is 32 years old and is from Sana`a, Yemen. He is married and has two children. He has a taxi which he wishes to improve for his family's pleasant life. He is a hardworking man. He saved up money to buy his taxi which he uses to get daily income for his family. He is asking for a  loan of 150,000 YER to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for taxi.

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is 47 years old.  He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been operating a clothes and cosmetic store. 

He is able to choose appropriate merchandise because he has a good eye.  He chose this business because it is very profitable, and he has gained permanent clients over the years. He is friendly, polite, and always gives a discount. 

He said he collected a small amount to open his enterprise. He would like borrow money to provide his customer needs. So he has applied for a loan of YER 200,000 from AMB to purchase clothes and cosmetic material for his business. He will use this loan to purchase new merchandise and diversify. 

In the future, Ahmed would like to open a clothing store to increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and cosmetic material for his business.

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en:
Ahmed is 45 years old and married, with six children.  The family lives in Taiz, Yemen.

Ahmed intends to buy home appliances, so he applied for a loan of YER 300,000 from AMB to buy furniture for his home. He hopes to own a retail shop.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his home.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María Isabel vive junto a su hijo en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de pollos, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa  experiencia que le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, tiene mucha clientela fija y últimamente ha tenido más demanda pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer muy activa y siempre aprovecha todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que al vencer sin obstáculos se triunfa sin gloria y quiere triunfar al máximo, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar pollos por mayor. María Isabel tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se siente muy contenta con el apoyo, y asegura que con todo su esfuerzo podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido, tiene la confianza que asi podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Isabel lives with her son in her own home. She works buying and selling chickens. She has been doing this work for several years and this was given her valuable experience which allows her to earn a good income. She has a lot of regular customers and recently she has had greater demand. Everything she sells is good quality at accessible prices, and the service is excellent. María is an active woman who always takes advantage of every opportunity that presents itself. She believes that without obstacles, there is no glory, and she wants to succeed. This is why she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy chickens wholesale. María Isabel has good payment references and a high moral character. She is very glad for the support and is sure that with all her effort she will be able to pay off the loan in the agreed upon time period. She is confident that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life that way.

loans.use: to buy chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es: María Marta vive con su compañero de vida, su hijo y su nieta en casa propia, Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras tomates, cebollas, chiles, naranjas, fresas, entre otros, en un lugar que califico como muy favorable para su venta, tiene varios años con el negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocida en la zona pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María  es una mujer con muchas metas por alcanzar siempre dispuesta a valorar cada oportunidad que se le presente, su labor es hacer crecer el negocio y mantenerlo adelante de la competencia, sabe que asi alcanzara el éxito, últimamente aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a los clientes, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. María Marta tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que así podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor
texts.en:
María Marta lives with her life partner, her son, and her granddaughter in her own house. She works selling fruits and vegetables – tomatoes, onions, chilies, oranges, and strawberries, among others – in a place that she rated as very favorable for her sales. 

She’s been in this business for several years and has acquired a lot of experience that allows her to obtain better earnings. She is very well known in the area, as everything that she sells is of good quality, and she sells it at affordable prices; in addition, her service is excellent. 

María is a woman with many goals to attain; she is always ready to evaluate each opportunity that presents itself to her. Her task is to make her business grow and keep it ahead of the competition. She knows that in this way, she will achieve success. 

Recently, demand has increased, and she doesn’t want to disappoint her customers; therefore, she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that allows her to purchase fruits and vegetables in bulk. María Marta has good payment references and is very responsible. She assures that she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time, she is confident that in this way, she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Milagro Elizabeth

texts.es: Milagro Elizabeth de veintisiete años de edad vive con su compañero de vida en casa alquilada. Ella posee una venta de refrescos desde hace mas de doce años en un lugar que califico como estratégico para comerciar,  es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues sus refrescos son preparadas con material de primera calidad y a un buen precio, además tienen un sabor inigualable; Milagro es una mujer muy activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante y triunfar, piensa que hay que prometerse ser siempre fuertes y constantes, para  al final del camino tener éxito y felicidad, está dispuesta a lograrlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas, azúcar, agua, utensilios etc. Milagro Elizabeth tiene muy buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy satisfecha con el apoyo asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y además tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Milagro Elizabeth is 27 years old and lives with her life’s partner in a rented home.  She has been selling soft drinks for more than 12 years from a location that can be classified as a strategic business location.  She is very well known in her zone and has many steady customers.  Her drinks are prepared with quality ingredients at good prices.  The taste is also unequalled.  Milagro is a very active woman with a great desire to get ahead and succeed.  She believes that one must always promise to be strong and constant to be successful and happy.  She’s prepared to do this, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy fruits, sugar, water, utensils, etc.  Milagro Elizabeth has a very good payment record and is very responsible.  She is satisfied with the support and is certain that she will be able to repay the loan on time and provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Lorenza De Los Angeles

texts.es: Lorenza de los Ángeles vive junto a su compañero de vida y dos hijos; Ella se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas desde hace varios años y eso le ha regalado experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia y le vende a todas las personas de la zona,  es muy conocida pues elabora las tortillas más ricas y calientitas, hechas con material de primera calidad y vendidas a precio accesible además el servicio es el más rápido; Lorenza es una mujer decidida y entregada a su labor, piensa que lo más importante es no dejar de caminar en el lugar correcto porque solo así se llega al éxito, en estas últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda por parte de  la clientela y Lorenza necesita invertir más en insumos para aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y leña suficiente para toda esta temporada. Lorenza de los Angeles tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá pagar toda la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
Lorenza de los Ángeles lives together with her life partner and their two children. She has made tortillas for several years, and this has given her valuable experience that allows her to generate the most profit. Her business is located in her home, and she sells to all the people in the area. She is well known because her tortillas are the hottest and most delicious. She makes them with the finest quality ingredients and sells them at accessible prices. She also has the fastest service. Lorenza is determined and dedicated to her work. She thinks that the most important thing is to never stop walking along the right path because that’s the only way to be successful.

In the past few weeks Lorenza has seen a rise in customer demand, so she needs to invest in more ingredients to increase production. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow her to purchase wholesale corn and enough firewood for the season. Lorenza de los Angeles has a good credit history. She is certain that she will be able to pay off her debt and at the same time, offer her family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: invest in wholesale corn and firewood

loans.name: Alirio De Jesús

texts.es: “La vida en ocasiones suele traernos pruebas que creemos que no seremos capaces de superar” esta es la frase con la que Alirio de 51 años de edad comienza a relatarnos su historia de vida. Alirio laboró por más de 20 años en una finca, en la cual sufrió un accidente de trabajo  y perdió su brazo izquierdo, como si fuera poco su esposa lo abandonó dejándolo con sus dos hijas de 13 y 18 años de edad. Debido a esta situación decidió  sobreponerse y luchar por sacar adelante a sus hijos, aprendió del oficio de la confección y hoy este se ha convertido en su sustento de vida. Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar su proyecto de empresa y para lograrlo necesita inversión en capital, por lo cual recurre a un préstamo para la compra de máquinas.
texts.en: "Life sometimes tends to bring us evidence to make us believe that we will not be able to succeed."  This is the phrase that 51 year old Alirio uses to begin telling us his life’s story.  Alirio worked in the fields for more than 20 years, where he suffered an accident and lost an arm, leaving him with two daughters, ages 13 and 18.  Because of this, he decided to continue working to get his children ahead, and learned to make clothing.  This has become his way of earning a living.  His greatest dream is to expand his company but he needs working capital, so he has requested a loan to buy sewing machines.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: Doña Beatriz de 37 años de edad, es una mujer, pujante y con ganas de salir adelante con su esposo y sus dos hijas, es ama de casa pero esto no ha sido un obstáculo para buscar la forma de generar ingresos y colaborar con las obligaciones del hogar. Asegura que quiere ser una gran empresaria, pero su mayor prioridad es su familia, por eso a decidido vender productos por catálogo pero no cuenta con el dinero para comenzar iniciar su negocio. Solicita crédito para comprar los productos que desea comercializar. Su mayor sueño es poderle ofrecer a sus hijas una buena educación y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Beatriz is 37 years old and is a vigorous woman with a desire to get ahead along with her husband and two daughters.  She is a housewife but this has not been an obstacle for her to search for a way to generate an income and help with the household expenses.  She want so be a great entrepreneur but her family is her number one priority, so she has decided to sell products via catalog.  She doesn’t have the money to start her business so she requested a loan to buy products.  Her greatest dream is to be able to offer her daughter a good education and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: John Edilson

texts.es: Jhon Edilson es un gran guerrero que busca la forma de ganarse el pan de cada día para él y su familia. Tienes 39 años de edad y una hija de 14, a la que sueña poderle brindar la educación a la que él no tuvo oportunidad por su difícil situación desde que era niño. “El amor y las ganas de ver a mi hija como una profesional son las que me motivan a desplazarme todos los días al centro de la ciudad en donde me gano la vida vendiendo papas fritas” estas son las palabras con las que Jhon describe su motivación  diaria. Su necesidad en este momento es adecuar el carro de papas y comprar materia prima para incrementar sus ventas, por lo cual solicita crédito ya que no posee los recursos propios para realizarle esta inversión al negocio.
texts.en:
John Edilson is a great fighter who looks for how to earn his daily bread for him and his family. He is 39 and his daughter is 14. His dream is to offer her a good education. He never had the opportunity to study because of his difficult situation since he was a boy. 

“My love and the desire to see my daughter become a professional are what motivate me to go every day to the city center where I earn a living selling potato chips.” These are the words that John used to describe his daily motivation. 

Presently he needs to make adjustments to the potato cart and purchase raw materials to increase his sales. He is requesting a loan since he does not have enough resources by himself to make this investment in his business.

loans.use: purchase raw material and make improvements to his potato chip cart

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es: Luz Elena es una mujer de 54 años de edad a la que la vida le ha ensañado que las cosas se ganan con el sudor de la frente, que el trabajo honesto siempre trae buenas recompensas, y que la felicidad no es el dinero si no la tranquilidad con  la que puedes vivir. “Aunque no tengo muchas comodidades, día a día consigo mi sustento” con estas frases doña Luz Elena nos manifiesta que le agradece a Dios por darle la capacidad de trabajar y de tener buenas ideas de negocio. Su tienda de barrio es la generadora de su sostenimiento en la ciudad y desea invertir un dinero en mercancía para esta navidad, por eso recurre a la solicitud de un crédito  con el que espera pueda ver su tienda mas surtida.
texts.en: Luz Elena is a 54 year old woman who has learned that things in life are earned through perspiration, that honest work always brings good rewards, and that happiness is not money, but rather tranquility that one can live by.  “Even though I don’t have many comforts, I earn my keep every day.”  It’s with these phrases that Luz Elena lets us know that she appreciates God for having given her the capacity to work and have good business ideas.  Her neighborhood store generates her support in town and she wants to invest some money into Christmas merchandise, so she is asking for a loan to better stock her store.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: María Leticia

texts.es: María Leticia de 61 años de edad, separada y con 10 hijos, es un vivo ejemplo de la pujanza que tenemos las mujeres. Es ama de casa, lo que implica que todos los días debe levantarse muy temprano a realizar sus quehaceres y luego dedicarse a la venta de mermeladas y granizados  a las afueras de varios colegios de su localidad. En estos momentos su actividad se ha visto afectada porque su carrito necesita con urgencia algunos repuestos y no cuenta con el dinero para realizar los cambios correspondientes, por dicho motivo recurre a un crédito para iniciar cuanto antes con su actividad. Su mayor sueño es poder tener un local en el que pueda vender sus productos de manera constante, ya que en muchas ocasiones los factores climáticos le impiden realizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
María Leticia is 61 and separated with 10 children. She is a living example of the strength that women have. She is a home maker, meaning every day she has to wake up early to do all the chores, and later, go to work selling jam and slushies outside of various schools in her area. 
 
Her sales have been affected because her cart urgently needs some replacement parts, and she does not have the money to make the necessary changes. Therefore, she is turning to a loan to be able to work again as soon as possible. Her biggest dream is to have a location where she can sell her products in a constant manner, since on many occasions climate factors have gotten in the way of her making sales.

loans.use: make improvements to her slushy cart

loans.name: Dario De Jesús

texts.es: Darío de 53 años de edad, se dedica a la venta puerta a puerta de mercancía desde hace más de 5 años. Labor que le suministra el sustento para su familia integrada por su esposa y tres hijos. “Me rebusco la vida como puedo, pues mis hijos necesitan de mi, para poder estudiar y mientras yo tenga vida lucharé por ofrecerles lo mejor” con estas palabras don Darío manifiesta el por qué todos los días se levanta con el mejor de los ánimos para ir en búsqueda de nuevos clientes. Su mayor anhelo es incrementar la variedad de productos que ofrece con el fin de obtener mayor rentabilidad, es por ello que ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de nuevo surtido.
texts.en: Dario is 53 years old and has been selling door to door for more than five years.  This is how he supports his family which consists of his wife and three children.  “I live my life as I can because my children need me so they can go to school and as long as I live I will work hard to provide the best for them.”  Through these words Dario lets us know that he gets up every day with a desire to search for new clients.  His greatest desire is to increase the variety of products he offers in order to increase his profits, so he has requested a loan.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools to fix vehicles.

loans.name: Hernándo Emilio

texts.es: Hernando de 58 años de edad, casado y con 4 hijos, es un campesino dedicado al cultivo de papa y flor desde su juventud, actividad que es su principal fuente de sustento para él y su familia. El cambio climático de la región le ha ocasionado cuantiosas pérdidas en sus cultivos, por lo cual solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos y abonos, que sembrará nuevamente en su lote. Debido a la crítica situación por la que atraviesa se ha visto en la obligación de buscar empleo, pero por su edad le ha sido difícil. Espera que con el crédito pueda volver a su gran pasión que es la agricultura.
texts.en: Hernando is 58 years old. He is married with 4 children. He is a farmer, and since his youth he has worked growing potatoes and grain. This activity is the main livelihood for himself and his family. The changing climate in the region has caused Hernando considerable losses to his crops.  For this reason he is applying for a loan in order to buy supplies and fertiliser, with which he will sow on his plot again. Due the critical situation in which he finds himself Hernando has been forced to look for a job, but at his age, it has been difficult. He hopes that with this loan he will be able to return to his great passion which is agriculture.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertiliser

loans.name: María Del Perpetuo

texts.es: María de 47 años de edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos, se dedica a la cría de cerdos desde hace varios años, como fuente de ingreso para su hogar. “La porcicultura es una forma digna de ganarse la vida y es lo que sé hacer desde mi juventud, debido a que crecí en una finca en donde se criaban cerdos, vacas y pollos” dice maría en un todo orgulloso. Sueña con tener una piara (muchos cerdos), que le proporcione mejores condiciones de vida. Actualmente solicitó un crédito para la construcción de un corral en donde albergar sus animales, debido a que la que tiene actualmente no es suya y se encuentra demasiado retirada de su vivienda, situación que le produce mucho agotamiento generado por los varios kilómetros que recorre cada día para suministrarles la comida a sus porcinos.
texts.en:
María, 47, is married and has five children.  For several years, she has been in the business of raising pigs to earn an income for her household.  "Raising pigs is a decent way to earn a living and it is what I have been doing since my youth.  I grew up on a farm where pigs, cows and chickens were raised.", says María with much pride.  

Her goal is to have a large pig farm to improve her living conditions.  Currently, she is requesting a loan to build a farmyard for her animals because the one she has is not hers and is too far away from her home, which is tiring because of all the kilometers she must travel daily to feed the pigs.

loans.use: To build a farmyard.

loans.name: María Carolina

texts.es: Doña María a sus 63 años de edad, lo que le sobran son ganas de salir adelante en compañía de su esposo, por eso trabajan fuertemente día a día de 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, en la tienda que montaron hace 3 años. María desea comprar más surtido debido a que su clientela cada día se lo está demandando y como ella no cuenta con los recursos para realizar dicha inversión, solicita un préstamo para poder incrementar sus ingresos y obtener un mejor nivel de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en: María, 63, is very determined to get ahead.  She and her husband work hard every day from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. in the store they opened three years ago.  María wants to buy more merchandise because of the increasing demand from her customers.  Since she does not have the resources to carry out the investment, she is requesting a loan to help increase her income so she and her family can lead a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: Pedro Pablo de 68 años de edad, es un luchador que día a día busca el sustento de vida para él y su familia. Este guerrero se dedica a la venta de frutas, labor que le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos y poderles ofrecer educación. Aunque su vida no ha sido fácil siempre trata de dar lo mejor porque considera que su familia es lo más importante. Comenzó vendiendo fruta en un carreta con la que recorría las calles de la ciudad y gracias a su esfuerzo y disciplina logró montar su propio negocio. Hoy está en búsqueda de un préstamo con el que quiere adecuar su local y comprar surtido para aumentar las ventas en esta temporada.
texts.en:
Pedro Pablo, 68, struggles every day to earn an income for his family.  This hard worker sells fruit for a living and has been able to support his children and give them an education.  Even though his life has not been easy, he always tries to do the best he can for his family, which is what he cares about most.

He began selling fruit from a cart as a street vendor in the city and, thanks to his efforts and discipline, was able to set up his own business.  Now he is requesting a loan to renovate his shop and buy goods to increase sales this season.

loans.use: To buy goods and renovate his shop.

loans.name: Reinaldo De Jesús

texts.es: “Desde que no falte la papita para comer y las ganas de trabajar uno está bien” esas son las palabras de don Reinaldo de 60 años de edad, al que le sobran motivos para salir adelante, dice que a su edad es muy difícil conseguir un empleo estable, por lo cual decidió abrirse paso como microempresario y montar su propio negocio de legumbres en su barrio. Desea comprar más surtido ya que sus clientes en concurridas ocasiones solicitan productos que él no tiene  y manifiesta ha sido el motivo de que sus ventas no se incrementen. Por esta razón a solicitado un crédito que le permita surtir su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
“I am doing well because I want to work and because there is not a lack of potatoes to eat,” are the words of Don Reinaldo, age 60, explaining his reasons behind his success. Due to his age, it was difficult for him to obtain stable employment, so he decided to become a micro-entrepreneur and open a small business selling legumes in his neighborhood.

Don Reinaldo wants to be better stocked since his customers have requested products that he does not have on busy occasions. He says that this is the reason why his sales have not increased. This explains why he is requesting a loan, which will enable him to restock his business and improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional inventory of legumes.

loans.name: Verónica

texts.es: Verónica es una mujer con muchas habilidades para el comercio, y bien que ha sabido explotar su talento. Desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, actividad que le ha permitido generar ingresos para ella y su madre, y le ha dado la oportunidad de estudiar. A su corta edad ella tiene millones de sueños que esperan hacerse realidad con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, uno de ellos es montar su propio almacén, pero por el momento sólo busca comprar más surtido para esta temporada, por lo cual ha solicitado un préstamo y comenzar con la venta de mercancía.
texts.en: Verónica has tremendous sales skills and knows how to exploit her talents well.  For seven years she has been in the business of selling clothing, which has allowed her to generate an income for her mother and herself, and paid for her education.  At her young age she has a million dreams she hopes to realize through hard work.  One of them is to open her own shop, but for the time being she only wants to buy merchandise for this season.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to start selling merchandise.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: Alba luz, de 53 años de edad,   ha pasado por situaciones bastante dolorosas en su vida, soportar la muerte de sus padres ha sido el suceso más difícil. Debido a esto ella se ve en la necesidad de migrar a la ciudad en búsqueda mejores alternativas de vida. Allí se dedica a la elaboración y venta de almuerzos. Gracias a su pujanza hoy cuenta con un negocio que le brinda el sustento diario. En la actualidad ella tiene la necesidad de comprar un enfriador y licor para vender en su negocio, por esto se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para realizar dicha inversión ya que carece de recursos propios. Su mayor anhelo es que sus ingresos aumenten y mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alba Luz is 53 years old. She has gone through some very painful situations in her life. She suffered through the death of her parents, which was the most difficult thing. Because of this, she needed to move to the city seeking better ways to make a living. That is how she began to make and sell lunches.Thanks to her efforts, today she has a business that supports her daily. Right now, she needs to buy a refrigerator and liquor to sell in her business. That is why she is asking for a loan to make that investment, since she lacks the resources. Her biggest wish is for her income to increase and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy assets and some materials (a refrigerator and liquor).

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer de 35 años de edad, madre soltera, llena de sueños y con una mirada hacia el futuro prometedora. Desde hace 15 años ha laborado como operaria en diferentes talleres de la ciudad. Pero hoy tiene la convicción de montar su propio taller, el cual trabajará en conjunto con su hija de 18 años. Para cumplir su sueño ella necesita comprar una fileteadora pero no cuenta con el dinero para realizar esta inversión, por lo cual solicita un crédito con el que comenzará a materializar su proyecto de empresa.
“Mi madre es una mujer soñadora que siempre anda en búsqueda de lo mejor para mi, por esto en mi tiempo libre me dedico a aprender a su lado”. Estas son las palabras de su hija, la cual se siente muy orgullosa de su madre y espera que su negocio pueda convertirse algún día en una gran empresa.
texts.en:
Diana, 35, is a single mother, full of dreams and with a positive outlook. She has been working as a machine operator in different workshops in the city for fifteen years. However, she is now thinking of starting her own workshop, together with her 18-year-old daughter. In order to make her dream come true, she needs to buy an overlock machine, but she does not have the money required to make this investment. For this reason, she is requesting a loan with which she will realize her enterprise project.

"My mother is a dreamer, she is always striving to give me the best, and this is why I spend my free time next to her, learning from her". These are her daughter’s words, who feels proud of Diana and hopes that her business can one day become a large company.

loans.use: to buy an overlock machine.

loans.name: Jair Darien

texts.es: Jair, es un hombre de 37 años de edad, al que le ha tocado ser madre y padre de su hijo de 11 años, después de sufrir el abandono de su esposa. “Mi hijo es mi mayor motivación, por él es quien me levanto cada día a abrir mi tienda de billar”. Con estas palabras Jair expresa la razón de tantos sacrificios que tiene que padecer cada día. Su mayor sueño es poderle brindar a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida, que pueda acceder al colegio como cualquier niño de su edad. Hoy anda en búsqueda de mejorar su situación económica y para ello ha recurrido a un préstamo el cual invertirá en surtido para la temporada de fin de año, periodo en el que se incrementan las ventas en su negocio.
texts.en: Jair is a 37 year old man who has had to be both mother and father to his 11 year old son after his wife left him. “My son is my biggest motivation, and that is why I get up every day to open my billiard's store". With these words, Jair expresses the reason for so much sacrifice that he has to do every day. His biggest dream is to offer his son a better quality of life so he can access school like any boy his age. Today he seeks to improve his financial situation and for that he has turned to a loan which he will invest in merchandise for the end of the year season, when his sales increase.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: María Aidé

texts.es: María Aidé vive junto a su compañero de vida, sus hijos y sus nietos; ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, lociones, cremas, cosméticos, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y en forma ambulante, es muy conocida en el lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues  todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, para complementar los gastos del hogar tambien vende ropa en variedad; María es una mujer emprendedora, visionaria siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que la lleven al éxito, quiere hacer crecer el negocio y planea invertir en insumos, pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos, perfumes, cremas etc. María Aidé tiene la experiencia crediticia y muy buenas recomendaciones, tiene la certeza que podrá saldar su financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merece.
texts.en: María Aidé lives with her life's companion, and her children and grandchildren. She sells person use products such as lotions, creams, and cosmetics. She has had this business for several years and it has given her a lot of experience that allows her to make better earnings. She sells from her home and door to door. She is well known in the area and has gained many customers. Everything she sells is top quality and at accessible prices and the service is excellent. To add to the household budget she also sells a variety of clothes. María is an enterprising woman, a visionary who is always waiting for new opportunities that will take her to sucess. She wants to grow her business and plans to invest in materials, but she needs capital and that is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy cosmetics, perfumes, creams etc. María Aidé has credit experience and very good recommendations. She is sure she can pay off her loan and at the same time give her family the quality of life it deserves.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume and creams.

loans.name: Victor Alonso

texts.es: Víctor de 34 años de edad, es un hombre al que la vida le ha negado el privilegio de estudiar, pues desde niño le ha tocado trabajar como jornalero en donde resulte. Cansado de las inclemencias de muchas personas y del abuso de otras, decidió dedicarse a realizar labores de jardinería en donde lo soliciten. Actualmente, Víctor necesita comprar algunas herramientas que son indispensables para realizar bien su labor, no cuenta con el dinero para hacerlo y por eso solicita un crédito. Su mayor anhelo es poderle ofrecer a su hijo de 12 años una excelente educación, porque está convencido que este es el regalo más valioso que puede entregarle.
texts.en: Víctor, 34, did not have the privilege of getting an education because he had to start working at a very young age.  Tired of many people's harshness and abusive attitudes, he decided to go into business for himself as a gardener.  Víctor needs to buy some tools that are necessary for his trade and he does not have the money to do so.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan.  His greatest goal is to give his 12-year-old son a good education because he believes this would be the most valuable gift he could give him.

loans.use: To buy tools.

loans.name: Elida Yesica

texts.es: Elida Yesica vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la producción y venta de dulces típicos, de leche, tamarindo, nance, entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda en una zona muy concurrida de personas, tiene varios años con la venta y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permita obtener las mejores ganancias ya tiene  mucha clientela fija porque es una excelente vendedora y porque todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad cuando atiende el negocio; Elida es una mujer ejemplar, siempre dedicada a su labor y a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse y alcanzar el éxito en el futuro; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar leche, tamarindo, nance, azúcar, etc. Elida Yesica tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elida Yesica lives with her life partner and her children in her own house.  She earns a living making and selling traditional candy made of caramel, tamarind, and nance fruit, among others.  She sells on foot and from home in a very busy area.

She has had the business for several years and has acquired a lot of experience, which allows her to get the best profits.  She has a lot of steady customers because she's an excellent saleswoman and because everything she sells is of good quality at affordable prices.  Also, she's known for her pleasantness when she does business.

Elida's an exemplary woman, always dedicated to her job and waiting for opportunities to improve herself and be successful in the future.  She wants to make her business grow but needs to invest, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy milk, tamarind, nance fruit, sugar, etc.

Elida Yesica has good a good credit record and is confident that she'll be able to pay back her debt and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy milk, tamarind, nance fruit, and sugar

loans.name: Leidy Tatiana

texts.es:
Leidy Tatiana es una joven que se ha ganado la admiración de su familia, a sus 20 años ya comienza a proyectarse como una mujer de negocios. En  la sala de su casa decidió montar un café internet y videojuegos, con el propósito de financiar sus estudios en la universidad. Desea ser una gran profesional pero no cuenta con un apoyo económico y por eso decidió mirar una fuente de ingresos. “Lo importante es tener claro que es lo que se quiere en la vida, lo demás  se va dando en el  camino” con estas frases Leidy cuenta que llegará a convertirse en la mejor profesional y que no importa que sacrificios tenga que hacer pero que conseguirá realizar su sueño.
En estos momentos se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que financiará la compra de los equipos de cómputo y el video juego, ya que no cuenta con recursos propios para realizar esta inversión.
texts.en:
Leidy Tatiana is a young woman who has earned the admiration of her family as at only 20 years old she is already revealing herself as a business woman. She decided to set up an internet and gaming café in her living room with the aim of financing her university studies. 

She hopes to be a great professional but doesn't have any financial backing and so decided to look for a source of income. "The most important thing is to clearly know what you want in life. You will work out the rest on the way". With these phrases Leidy says that she will become the best professional and that it doesn't matter what sacrifices she has to take, she will see her dream come true. 

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan to finance the purchase of the computer and video game equipment as she doesn't have any of her own resources to invest.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Rubenia De Jesús

texts.es: Rubenia de Jesús  de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee una taller de costura, donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, elabora las mejores prendas con material de primera calidad y la vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único Rubenia siempre está a la orden de las personas que la visitan, ademas para complementar los gastos del hogar vende cosmeticos; Rubenia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su meta  es luchar con esfuerzo y dedicación para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar las ganancias de su negocio por eso invertirá para aumentar la producción y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, tela por mayor, hilos, agujas, etc. Rubenia de Jesús tiene buenas referencias de pago, es responsable y con una moral intachable sabe con seguridad que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rubenia de Jesús, 32, lives with her life partner and children.  She has a tailor shop where she makes all types of garments for women, men, and children.  She has been in this business for many years and has a lot of experience.  She's well known in the area and has acquired a lot of customers.  She makes the best garments with top-quality materials and sells at affordable prices.  Also, her service is extraordinary.  Rubenia is always ready to serve her visitors.  To supplement the household expenses, she also sells cosmetics.

Rubenia's an enterprising woman who wants to get ahead.  Her goal is to strive for success with effort and dedication.  She wants to increase the profits of her business, so she'll invest to increase production.

She needs capital, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric wholesale, thread, needles, etc.

Rubenia de Jesús has a good credit record.  She's responsible and has impeccable morals, and knows with certainty that she'll pay back the loan as well as be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale, thread, needles, and cosmetics

loans.name: Dante

texts.en: Dante is a 39-year-old farmer. He has been planting and harvesting rice for over 10 years now. He sustains his family through his income from selling the raised crops. He has six children, and two attend school. Dante would like to improve his crop; that is why he is asking for a loan to invest in his rice field. He is asking for PHP 20,000 to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use on his farm. He hopes to keep achieving abundant harvests to maintain the business and generate good profits for his family.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to use on his farm.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en: Living a fortunate life is what Jesus, above, wants for his family. He is a farmer who lives at Amulung with his wife and four children. He is now 45 years old and has been planting and harvesting rice to sell for over 10 years. He usually earns about PHP 20,000 each harvest season and it goes toward meals and education fees for his children. Jesus is now asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming. This loan will help nourish his crops and someday allow him to harvest them profitably. With the additional income generated, he will continue to pay school fees, and someday hopes to be happy and proud to see his children as professionals in their chosen careers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming

loans.name: Luz Marleny

texts.es: Luz Marleny, de 47 años de edad, siempre anda en búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades de negocio, pues es madre soltera y necesita traer a casa el pan de cada día. Es una mujer emprendedora que encuentra en cada dificultad una oportunidad de salir adelante. Debido a la carencia de empleo ella tomó la decisión de vender productos puerta a puerta en su barrio. Su mayor sueño es poder montar en su casa un negocio que le proporcione lo necesario para vivir y no tener que desplazarse cada día cientos de kilómetros para vender su mercancía. Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un crédito para comprar los productos que comercializará y generar mayores ingresos que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz Marleny, aged 47, is always looking for new business opportunities as she is a single mother and needs to put bread on the table each day. She is an entrepreneurial woman who finds an opportunity to get ahead in every difficulty. 

Due to the lack of work, she took the decision to sell products door to door in her area. Her biggest dream is to be able to set up a business in her home which provides enough to live on so she doesn't have to travel hundreds of kilometres every day to sell her products. 

Right now, she is requesting a loan to buy products to sell and generate more income from which will give her a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es: Manuel  de 54 años de edad es un gran emprendedor, es oficial de construcción pero debido a la carencia de empleo se vio en la necesidad de dedicarse a otra actividad.  Por lo cual abrió una cafetería que le proporcionará una entrada económica para poderle ofrecer a sus hijos una educación. Se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que le permita comprar surtido para su negocio, ya que sus clientes se lo demandan. Desea poder adecuar el local con el fin de que sus ingresos mejoren y su calidad de vida cambie.
texts.en: Manuel is 54 years old and very enterprising.  He is a construction foreman but because jobs were scarce he saw the need to look for something else, so he opened a café.  This provides him financial benefits so that he can provide an education for his children.  He is asking for a loan so that he can supply his business and meet his customers’ demands.  He wants to be able to set up a stall so that his income and quality of life increase.

loans.use: to supply his business.

loans.name: Mavisley

texts.es: Mavisley de 28 años de edad es una guerrera, que piensa en grande. Tiene claro que sus hijos necesitan de ella para salir adelante, y por eso se rebusca la vida con el oficio que aprendió desde su juventud. Cansada de soportar humillaciones por parte de sus compañeras de trabajo por su color de piel, decidió retirarse del salón de belleza donde laboraba y montar uno propio en la sala de su casa, en donde les dedica más tiempo a sus dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad. Mavisley necesita un crédito para comprar los insumos en su peluquería, debido a que carece de recursos propios. Su mayor sueño es que su salón de belleza sea reconocido y el número de clientes aumente, para que su ingresos también crezcan y poderle brindar a sus pequeños  todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
texts.en:
Mavisley is 28 years old. She is a fighter who thinks big. She understands that her children need her in order to get ahead and therefore she earns a living doing what she learnt when she was young. Tired of putting up with humiliating comments from her work colleagues over the colour of her skin, she decided to leave the beauty salon where she was working and set up her own in her living room where she can dedicate more time to her children, aged 6 and 2 years old. 

Mavisley needs a loan to buy products for her salon due to the lack of her own resources. Her biggest dream is that her beauty salon is recognised and that the number of clients increases so that her income also increases and she can give her little ones everything that she wasn't able to have.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is 27 years old, single and lives with his parents at Amulung. He has a farming business which he has been managing for 10 years now. He plants and harvests rice to sell. He usually earns PHP 15,000 each harvest season, twice a year. He uses his income to provide sustenance to his family and as capital for the business too. 

Jimmy is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs associated with the farming business such as tilling the land and sowing rice seeds. In the future, he would like to keep making his farm productive and save for his parents’ needs, especially as they are getting weak and old. It will help him achieve economic stability someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor costs

loans.name: Jorge Omar

texts.es: Jorge de 40 años de edad, está casado y tiene 2 hijos. Su familia es el motor de su vida y es por ellos que no le importa tener que trabajar los siete días a la semana con tal de poderle ofrecer a su familia un vida digna. Omar sueña con tener un almacén y poder compartir más tiempo con sus hijos. Pero es consciente que en el momento no cuenta con los recursos para materializar su sueño. Actualmente se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de más surtido para ampliar su portafolio de productos y generar mayores ingresos para su casa.
texts.en:
Jorge is 40 years old, married and has two children. His family is the driving force in his life and because of them he doesn't mind having to work seven days a week in order to be able to give his family a decent life.

Jorge dreams of having a shop and having more time to spend with his children. But he is aware that at the moment he doesn't have the resources to make his dream come true. 

Right now he is looking for a loan which he will invest in the purchase of more stock to broaden his portfolio of products and generate more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 34 years old and engages in selling kakanin and other prepared foods in her village, as well as buying and selling fruits and vegetables. She makes rice cakes, puto and bibingka every market day and sells them with banana, pechay, cabbage, avocado and ginger. Her kakanin adds to her income, so she patiently sleeps late in the evening and wakes up early in the morning to prepare it. She knows that through her hard work plus her continuously revolving capital, she will achieve a good standard of living with her family someday.  

But for 17 years in this business Nora has often experienced delayed payments by her clients. So sometimes she lacks working capital, and this has caused her to request a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy tomatoes, onions, garlic and malagkit rice as additional products to sell. She hopes that she will improve her business with the capital from ASKI, and will also be able to lift her family out of poverty and help her four children with their education.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, garlic and malagkit rice as additional products to sell

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es: Luisa es una joven de 20 años de edad, amante a la decoración y con un gran talento hacia el arte. Desde que cumplió la mayoría de edad ha laborado, debido a que debe aportar  a las obligaciones del hogar y pagarse sus estudios universitarios. Hace 6 mese se quedó sin empleo y gracias a la idea de un amigo comenzó a trabajar con artesanías explotando su gran talento. En la actualidad se siente inmensamente feliz por la oportunidad que la vida de dio de ser una microempresaria. Se encuentra en búsqueda de un préstamo con el que comprará una máquina que necesita para la elaboración de su producto. Su mayor sueño es poderse graduar de la universidad y ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luisa is a 20 year old young woman.  She loves decoration, and she has a great talent for art.  Ever since she was old enough, she has worked.  This is because she needs to contribute to the household obligations and pay for her university studies.

Six months ago she was left without employment.  Thanks to a friend’s idea, she started taking advantage of her great talent to work with handicrafts.  She is now extremely happy for the opportunity life gave her to be a small businesswoman.

She is looking for a loan to buy a machine she needs to make her product.  Her biggest dream is to be able to graduate from the university and to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make her handicrafts.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a humble business owner in Gattaran, Cagayan. She is widowed and an industrious mother of two children. To help her children, she creates her own source of income. She only has a high school level of education but she has had the courage to pursue her dream business and to hold on to the dream of sending her children to school until they finish their college education. Now, her business has already been operating for five years and it has slowly been developing well. 

Marilou is seeking additional working capital in order to make changes to her business. A loan of PHP 30,000 will be a great help to her. It will be used to purchase soft drinks, snacks, and school supplies such as notebooks and paper, since her business is located near a school. She hopes that generous people will help her to borrow the requested amount.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, snacks, and school supplies

loans.name: María Leonor

texts.es: María Leonor es una de esas mujeres digna de admiración, luchadora, pujante y una gran guerrera. Sufrió el abandono de su esposo con el cual tiene 5 hijos, hijos que tuvo que levantar y sacar adelante sola. Es una todera, pues es ama de casa, hace oficios en otros hogares y se dedica a la venta de mercancía puerta a puerta. Estas labores son su única fuente de ingresos pues el padre se sus hijos no le colabora con la manutención. María tiene prioridades en su vida y la principal es la educación de sus hijos, por eso no le importa trabajar tan fuerte cada día. En estos momentos está solicitando un crédito con el que espera comprar mercancía para esta temporada con la esperanza de aumentar sus ingresos y poderles comprar a sus hijos los uniformes para el colegio el próximo año.
texts.en:
María Leonor is one of those women who is worthy of admiration.  She is tenacious, strong, and a great trooper.  She suffered the abandonment of her husband with whom she has five children.  She had to lift the children up and get them ahead by herself.  She is a Jack-of-all-trades.

She is a housewife, she does jobs in other households, and she sells merchandise door to door.  These jobs are her only source of income.  The father of her children does not help with their support.

María has priorities in her life, and the first one is her children’s education.  Therefore, it does not bother her to work so hard each day.  She is now requesting a loan, which she plans to use to buy seasonal merchandise.  She hopes to increase her income and to be able to buy her children school uniforms for the next school year.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es: María Antonia de 29 años de edad, es una mujer dedicada a sus hijos,  comprometida con su bienestar y cuidado, por ello decidió buscar una actividad que le permitiera pasar la mayor parte del tiempo con ellos y al mismo tiempo generar ingresos para su casa debido  a que es madre cabeza de familia. Desea dedicarse a la venta de ropa desde su hogar pero no cuenta con el capital para comenzar con su negocio, por esto a recurrido a un crédito con el que comprará mercancía. Su mayor sueño es poder compartir con sus hijos cada instante que le sea posible porque esta es la fuente de su existencia.
texts.en:
María Antoia, age 29, is devoted to her children, and she is committed to their care and well-being.  She therefore decided to look for a business activity that would allow her so spend most of her time with them, and, at the same time, generate income for her house.  This is because she is a mother who is the head of her family.

She wants to sell clothes from her house, but she does not have the capital to start her business.  That is why she has turned to a loan, which she will use to buy merchandise.

Her biggest dream is to be able to share each moment possible with her children because they are her fountain of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Edilson Iván

texts.es: Edison de 28 años de edad, nació en el seno de una familia humilde, lleno de carencias y necesidades. Ésta situación lo impulsó a dejar su casa e ir en búsqueda de oportunidades de trabajo. De este modo logró reunir un dinero con el que empezó a vender legumbre, con el transcurrir del tiempo y la disciplina de este joven, logró montar su negocio, el cual se ha convertido en su sustento de vida y de su familia. Tiene dos hijos de 3 y 5 años a los que espera poderles ofrecer una vida digna y una buena educación. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de surtido, debido a que la demanda en fin de año se incrementa y los clientes se lo exigen.
texts.en:
Edison is 28 years old. He was born into a humble family, full of needs and necessities. This situation drove him to leave home and go looking for work opportunities. Through this he managed to save some money with which he started to sell vegetables and with time and this young man's discipline he was able to set up his own business which provides for him and his family. He has two children aged 3 and 5 who he hopes to be able to offer a decent life and good education.

He is asking for a loan to buy a range of products due to the increased demand at the end of the year from his customers.

loans.use: to buy stock

loans.name: Clark

texts.en:
Clark lives with his wife and two children in the village of Sta. Rosa. He is engaged in the farming business, particularly raising rice crops. He has been planting rice crops for five years. He is thankful because his previous loan had helped him much, most especially in making his rice field more productive.

Clark would like to keep improving his rice field, so he is requesting another loan amount of PHP 40,000, which will be used in buying farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticides. He knows that through implementation of proper plant care for his crops, he could further gain a better profit, which will enable him to educate his two children and improve their way of living.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticides for his farming business.

loans.name: Rosa Elida

texts.es: Rosa Elida de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, huevos, leche, pan entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio y ya tiene mucha experiencia, su tienda está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, comercia para todas las personas del lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija porque todos los productos que vende son de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre está a la orden de las personas; Rosa es una mujer trabajadora, dispuesta a superarse, está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades para lograr alcanzar un futuro con éxito, la demanda en el negocio ha aumentado porque los clientes siempre encuentran ahí lo que necesitan, Rosa tiene la idea de invertir más en producto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un creditito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas etc. Rosa Elida tiene muy buenas referencias de crédito es responsable y con moral impecable, confía que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rosa Elida is 49 years old and lives with her life partner and son in a home of her own.  She has a store where she sells primary needs products such as rice, beans, eggs, milk, bread, and other things.  She has been doing business for several years and has lots of experience.  Her store is located in her home and she has many steady customers because her products are top quality at good prices.  She also gives good service.

Rosa is a hardworking woman prepared to get ahead and ready to take on new opportunities to reach a successful future.  Demand in her business has increased because her customers always find what they need there.  Rosa wants to invest in more merchandise, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, etc.  Rosa Elida has good credit references and is of impeccable morality.  She is confident that she can repay the debt and give her family a better life.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Felanie

texts.en: Felanie manages a candy-making business that generates a monthly income of PHP 5,000. She delivers her products every day on a bicycle. She has been in this business for over a year. Felanie is aiming to increase the volume of her products but her capital is lacking due to household expenses and delayed payments by her customers. For her to reach her goal, she is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase sugar, milk, cocoa milk and yeast. Part of the loan will also be used to purchase flour to make miki (noodles) for snacks. She hopes that she can obtain the loan amount requested. She believes that despite the situation she has gone through, some day she can attain success for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, milk, cocoa milk and yeast. Part of the loan will also be used to purchase flour to make miki (noodles) for snacks.

loans.name: Rosario De Maria

texts.es: Rosario de María vive junto a su compañero de vida Fredy y sus tres hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de útiles escolares, cuadernos, lapiceros, papel entre otros, el negocio esta ubicado en un lugar que califico como muy bueno para su venta, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener siempre las ganancias esperadas, es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela pues siempre comercia lo que las personas necesitan a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; Rosario es una mujer  encantadora, dedicada a lo que ama , tiene grandes expectativas para el futuro por eso aprovechara todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar la producción por eso  le solicita a INTEGAL un crédito que le permita comprar cuadernos, papel, lapiceros, etc. Rosario de María tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, está segura que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez y darle a su fallí a una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rosario de María lives with her common-law husband Fredy and their three children in their own house. She sells school supplies, notebooks, pens, paper and other items. Her business is in a very good location for sales. She has worked in this business for many years; thus, gaining many years of experience that allow her to earn the expected profit. She is very well-known and has many customers since she always sells what people need at accessible prices with excellent customer service.

Rosario is a charming woman, doing what she loves. She has great expectations for the future and will take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself. In the last few weeks, the demand has increased and she wants to take advantage of this to increase her production. She will use the loan from INTEGRAL [MFI] to buy notebooks, paper, pens, etc. Rosario de María has good references for payment and is very responsible. She is sure that she will be able to pay the loan and provide her family with a full life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, paper, pens, etc.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es: Luis Gonzalo de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la compra y  venta de frijol, tiene varios años de poseer este pequeño negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, lo realiza de manera ambulante y desde su vivienda, ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente lo prefiere porque llega hasta las puertas de sus hogares con producto de calidad, a un buen precio y sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Luis es un hombre entregado a su labor, dispuesto a trabajar duro para en un futuro alcanzar el éxito, está seguro que solo necesita de constancia y motivación, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita  frijol por mayor. Luis Gonzalo tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago, agrádese y esta muy  contento por el apoyo,  tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Luis Gonzalo is thirty-two years old, lives together with his wife and children, and works selling beans. He has managed this small business for several years and has gained a lot of experience which allows him to obtain the best prices. He works from his home and as a traveling merchant. He already has a strong customer base because people prefer him because he comes straight to their doors, with a high-quality product, at a good price, and above all he provides excellent customer service. Luis is dedicated to his job, given to working hard toward success in the future. He knows all he needs is motivation and perseverance. For these reasons he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase beans at wholesale prices. Luis Gonzalo has a good credit history and good references. He is very grateful and happy for the assistance, and he is certain that he will repay his loan while at the same time giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beans at wholesale.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong was born in 1987. She has two children and her son is in the second grade. Her daughter is in kindergarten. Her husband and she sell shoes and flip-flops to earn a living. His income is about 6,000,000 dong [VND]. Huong also makes 6,000,000 dong (VND) a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 dong (VND) per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 dong (VND) and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 dong (VND) to buy more shoes and flip-flops to sell.

loans.use: to buy more shoes and flip-flops to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy was born in 1982. She has two children. The oldest son is 8 years old. The younger son is 10 months old. 

Her husband is an electrician and watering repairer. Thuy sells insurance to earn a living. She has done this job for three years. She gains from it 5,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

Thuy has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2010. In the last cycle, she borrowed 6,758,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,066,000 VND to earn more money by raising pigs and chickens in her small garden. 

She wants to use her benefit to bring up her children to grow well.

loans.use: to earn more money by raising pigs and chickens in her small garden.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en: Julita has managed her sari-sari (convenience store) business for over 30 years. She is 55 years old and a widow. She is earning PHP 6,000 a month and currently spends her income on basic necessities. She would like to increase her profit to improve her living situation as well as her business.
