Izidro is married with three children, all of whom are in school. He lives in his own house with his family, and he also supports his brother and three nephews who live with him.

He works for Mozambique Railways (Caminhos de Ferro de Moçambique). With this loan, he will buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, and wire, among others) to finish the porch of his house.

In the future, he would like to buy a minibus for semi-collective transport. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is having the sufficient funds and financing for his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, and wire, among others) to finish the porch of his house.

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly was born in 1972. She has three children: a 15-year-old girl, a 10-year-old girl, and a 5-year-old boy. Her husband is an aluminum frame glass worker. His income is 7,000,000 VND a month. Ly sells clothes to earn a living. She gets 6,000,000 VND a month from it. Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 VND per month. 
	She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2010. In the last cycle she borrowed 6,758,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 8,066,000 VND to buy clothes for her clothes shop. Her dream is to open one more clothes shop.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her clothes shop.

loans.name: Maqbool

texts.en: Ms. Maqbool is 47 years old and a mother of four children. For 17 years, she has been running a business selling milk with her husband. The man shown in the photo is Maqbool’s husband. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. With the passage of time her sales increased, as did her income. Now she has seven buffaloes and two cows. This has all happened due to her hard work and determination. Her husband is happy with her support and respects her a lot. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by renovating her house with the profit she earned through her business. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with Kashf Foundation and has shown good repayment behavior. She has some savings and applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: To purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Asia is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of five. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house for the last year. She offers various goods for daily use. She is very good in dealing with customers and counts a good client list. Her husband is employed in a government office and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is motivated to provide her family with good food, health and education. Her three sons are going to school. As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of Rs 50,000 to buy rice and flour from the market at lower rates. She then would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She is in her 6th loan cycle and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase business capital.

loans.use: To buy rice and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Fátima

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É Docente e do quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (arame, pregos, ferro, areia, cimento, blocos e outros) para fazer o murro de vedação da sua casa.
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para uso próprio, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir terminar os seus projectos e conseguir uma outra fonte para aumentar a sua receita.
texts.en:
Fátima is married with two children, both of whom are in school. She lives in her own house with her family and does not support anyone else.

She is a teacher employed by the Ministry of Education. With this loan, she will buy construction materials (wire, nails, iron, sand, cement, and blocks, among others) to build a wall around her house.

In the future, she would like to expand her house and obtain a vehicle for her own use. Therefore, she is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to finish her projects and obtain another source of income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (wire, nails, iron, sand, cement, and blocks, among others) to build a wall around her house.

loans.name: Nordino

texts.pt:
Solteiro e ainda sem filhos, vive na casa dos pais e sustenta seu irmão e a sua mãe que vive com ele.
É membro da Policia da Republica de Moçambique (PRM) e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, blocos, cimento, areia, pedra e outros) para dar inicio a obra de construção da sua casa.
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, mobilar e passar a residir lá, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ter fundos suficientes para poder concluir a sua casa.
texts.en:
Nordino is single and still has no children. He lives in his parents' house and supports his brother and mother, who live with him.

He is a member of the Policia da Republica de Moçambique (Mozambique Police Force). With this loan, he will buy construction materials (iron, blocks, cement, sand, and stone, among others) to start working on the construction of his house.

In the future, he would like to finish building his house, furnish it, and move in. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is having the sufficient funds to finish his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (iron, blocks, cement, sand, and stone, among others).

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 5 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para além da sua família.
É agricultor e possui uma área no regadio de Boane onde produz várias culturas. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar sementes, adubos e outros fertilizantes para aumentar a área de produção.
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa, trabalhar mais a terra e adquirir uma motobomba para outras áreas de cultivo, para isso vai pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ampliar cada vez mais as suas áreas de produção e investir em material agrícola.
texts.en:
Carlos is married with six children, five of whom are in school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone outside of his family.

He is a farmer and owns irrigated land in Boane, where he cultivates various crops. With this loan, he will buy seeds, compost, and other fertilizers to expand the area of production.

In the future, he would like to expand his house, work more on his land, and obtain a motor pump for other cultivation areas. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is to constantly expand his areas of production and to invest in agricultural materials.

loans.use: to buy supplies (seeds, fertilizer, and others).

loans.name: Doanh

texts.en:
Doanh was born in 1985. She has two children. Her son is learning in the 2nd grade. Her daughter is 30 months old. Her husband is a taxi driver. He gets 6,000,000 dong (VND) per month. Doanh has a grocery store. She gets 6,000,000 dong (VND). Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 dong (VND) per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy canned food, noodles and beverages for her grocery store. She wants to use the profits to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy canned food, noodles and beverages for her grocery store.

loans.name: Glória

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seu irmão mais novo.
É negociante vende produtos de beleza e adorno. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (toalhas, fios de ouro, pulseiras, roupa usada, fatos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial e investir na educação do filho, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é ampliar o seu negócio e continuara a pagar e pedir mais empréstimo.
texts.en:
She's single and has a son who attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her younger brother.
She's in retail and sells beauty products and ornaments. With the current loan she intends to purchase products (towels, gold thread, bracelets, used clothing, suits, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to build a store and invest in her son's education. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is expanding her business. She will make her repayments and apply for more loans.

loans.use: to purchase towels, gold thread, bracelets, used clothing, suits, etc. for selling.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 3 sobrinhos que vivem com ela.
É comerciante e vende produtos alimentares diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, sumos, leite, cerveja, feijão e outros) para reforçar a sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja iniciar a criação de frangos de corte como forma de aumentar as fontes de rendimento, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos para poder realizar o seu projecto de criação de frangos.
texts.en:
Rosa is married with four children, three of whom are in school. She lives in her own house with her family, and she also supports three of her nephews who live with her.

She is a trader and sells various food products. With this loan, she will buy products such as rice, juice, milk, beer, and beans, among others, in order to stock her inventory.

In the future, she would like to start raising broiler chickens as a way to increase her sources of income. Therefore, she is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to obtain the funds to carry out her project of raising chickens.

loans.use: to buy rice, juice, milk, beer, beans, and other products.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 1 filha que já frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua sobrinha que vive com ela.
É comerciante vende produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, areia, cimento, blocos e outros) para continuar com o melhoramento da sua casa.
No futuro deseja construir uma barraca para o comércio em sua residência, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é requerer financiamentos para poder responder as suas necessidades.
texts.en:
She's married and has a daughter who already attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her niece who lives with her.
She's in retail and sells various products. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (iron, sand, cement, bricks, etc.) in order to continue improving her home.
In the future she wishes to build a sales stall in her house. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is obtaining the loans that can fulfill her needs.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (iron, sand, cement, bricks, etc.) in order to continue improving her home.

loans.name: Amélia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ela.
É negociante vende produtos alimentares diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, feijão, massas, caldos, amendoim e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja construir uma barraca no seu quintal porque de momento usa apenas uma banca, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é manter-se firme e saudável para conseguir desenvolver bem o seu negócio
texts.en:
She's single and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a nephew who lives with  her.
She's in retail and sells various foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, beans, noodles, broths, peanuts, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to build a sales stand in her yard, since she currently uses only a board. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is keeping herself strong and healthy so that she can properly develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, noodles, broths, peanuts, etc. for selling.

loans.name: Natela

texts.en: Natela is 33 years old from the small village of Akhmeta district, East Georgia. She lives with her husband and parents-in-law, who are provided with a retirement pension. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they have a milk cow and a calf, produce cheese and sell locally in an open market at a good price. In addition, they have a vineyard and sell grapes locally. Each member of the family works hard and does their best to insure a good harvest. Natela requested a loan to purchase calves. After purchasing calves she will raise them and will get milk and produce dairy products. This will increase the income of the family and they will be able to improve their living conditions. Natela awaits your support

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Isabel

texts.pt:
Casada e sem filhos ainda, vive na casa própria com sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É operária numa empresa privada e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, ferro, cimento, pedra e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja mobilar a sua casa e oferecer conforto a sua família, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos suficientes para poder aplicar nos seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's married and doesn't have any children yet. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a laborer for a private company. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, iron, cement, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to furnish her house and provide more comfort for her family. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is obtaining enough funds for investing in her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, iron, cement, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Juma

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É pensionista e dono de uma serralharia e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, ferro, cimento, pedra e outros) para dar continuidade com a ampliação da sua casa.
No futuro deseja adquirir mais material para a sua serralharia e aumentar o seu desempenho, para tal compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos e garantir a sua saúde para poder trabalhar e reembolsar os fundos do empréstimo.
texts.en:
He's married and has a son who attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a pensioner and owns a locksmith's workshop. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, iron, cement, rocks, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.
In the future he wishes to acquire more supplies for his workshop and to improve his performance. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is obtaining funds and keeping himself healthy so that he can work and repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, iron, cement, rocks, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.

loans.name: Moniz

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante vende produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas de zinco, ferro, pedra e outros) para dar continuidade com a ampliação da sua casa.
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial em sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para poder ajudar no transporte de seus produtos, para tal compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir acumular fundos suficientes para estes projectos.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's in retail and sells various products. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, zinc sheets, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.
In the future he wishes to build a store in his house and to purchase a vehicle to help transport his merchandise. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is saving enough funds for these projetcs.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, zinc sheets, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue enlarging his house.

loans.name: Januário

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com sua família e sustenta 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ele.
É comerciante cria e vende frangos de corte e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação.
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial de venda de produtos alimentares, para isso compromete-se pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aplicar devidamente os fundos do empréstimo para poder alcançar o seu objectivo.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports two nephews who live with him.
He's a trader who raises broiler chickens. With the current loan he intends to purchase chicks, feed and vitamins in order to increase the quantity of the chickens he raises.
In the future he wishes to build a store for selling foodstuffs. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is making good use of the funds from the loan in order to achieve his goal.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed and vitamins for raising broiler chickens.

loans.name: L,entente Group

texts.fr:
Mme AGNES représente le groupe L’ENTENTE. Elle se porte bien. Marié, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 01 va à l’école et elle à 02 personnes à sa charge.
Mme vend des couches jetables, bijoux et pagnes depuis 01an. Elle s’approvisionne au Ghana. Ses clients sont les boutiquiers, femmes et hommes revendeurs.
Mme veut s’acheter 06paquets de couches, 30pièces de bijoux et 20complets pagnes.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut améliorer son activité et épargner. Mme ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique et s’occuper de ses enfants et de ses frères.
texts.en: Mrs. AGNES represents the L’ENTENTE group. She is doing well. She is a married mother of two children. The eldest is 12 years old, and the youngest is 2. One goes to school and she has two other people for whom she is responsible. Mrs. AGNES has been selling disposable diapers, jewels, and pagnes (traditional brightly colored cloths) for a year. She stocks up in Ghana. Her clients are shopkeepers and male and female resellers. Mrs. AGNES wants to buy 6 packets of diapers, 30 jewels, and 20 pieces of pagne. With her profits, she wants to improve her business and save. Mrs. AGNES aspires to open a large shop and to take care of her children and brothers.

loans.use: to buy 6 packets of diapers, 30 jewels, and 20 pieces of pagne

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Isabel, ella pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.  La socia es una joven madre de familia que tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar,  Isabel es ama de casa, y junto a su esposo tienen un automóvil, el cual alquilan para servicio de transporte de taxi, y esta actividad representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Isabel está solicitando el préstamo para dar mantenimiento periódico de  su carro y realizará cambio de aceite, aditivos y filtros.
Isabel está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad para ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y proporcionarles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Isabel belongs to the communal bank “Manos Juntas” in the city of Cusco, Perú. She is the young mother of three school-age children and a homemaker. She and her husband own a car that they use for taxi service and is their main source of household income. Isabel is applying for a loan to do regular maintenance and replace the car's oil, additives, and filters.

Isabel is very happy and thankful that Kiva lenders have allowed her to develop her business so that she can offer her family a better life and her children a good education.

loans.use: to change her vehicle's oil, additives, and filters.

loans.name: Sougrekonta 2 Group

texts.fr:
Mme RASMATA représente le groupe SOUGREKONTA 2. Elle se porte bien. Marié, elle est mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgé a 33ans et le moins âgé a 21ans. 01 va à l’école et elle à 02 personnes à sa charge.
Mme vend des pagnes, bijoux et  prêt à porter depuis 20ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé, en Côte d’Ivoire, au Mali et en Cotonou. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes.
Mme veut s’acheter 10 douzaines de prêt à porter, 05 douzaine de bijoux et des pagnes.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut épargner. Mme ambitionne améliorer son activité et assurer l’éducation de sa fille.
texts.en: Mrs. RASMATA represents the SOUGREKONTA 2 group. She is doing well. She is a married mother of three children. The eldest is 33, and the youngest is 21. One attends school, and she is responsible for two people. Mrs. RASMATA has been selling pagnes (traditional brightly colored cloths), jewels, and ready-to-wear clothing for twenty years. She stocks up in Lomé, in the Ivory Coast, in Mali, and in Cotonou. Her clients are women and men. Mrs. RASMAT wants to buy ten dozen pieces of ready-to-wear clothing, five dozen pieces of jewels, and some pagnes. With her profits, she wants to save up. She aspires to improve her business and ensure her daughter’s education.

loans.use: to buy ten dozen pieces of ready-to-wear clothing, five dozen pieces of jewels, and some pagnes

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, milk, cookies etc.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
El socio es el señor Florencio, él pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú. Florencio continúa con su actividad como agente de turismo y trabaja en este negocio familiar junto a una de sus hijas, vendiendo paquetes turísticos. Florencio está solicitando un préstamo para realizar reservas y programas turísticos y comprar tickets de tren, de accesos a grupos arqueológicos e ingresos a museos.
 Florencio agradece a  KIVA por permitirle seguir trabajando y desarrollándose en su actividad económica.
texts.en: Florencio belongs to the communal bank “Manos Juntas” in the city of Cusco, Perú. Florencio is still working with his daughters in their family business as a tourist agent selling tourism packages. He is applying for a loan to make reservations, set up tourist programs, and buy tickets for trains, archeological tours, and museums. He thanks Kiva for allowing him to continue working and developing his business.

loans.use: to buy tickets for trains, archeological tours, and museums.

loans.name: Hayme Iris

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Hayme, ella pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.  La socia es una joven madre de familia casada y con 3 hijos en edad escolar,  Hayme tiene un aserradero y comercializa todo lo que es madera para construcción y carpintería, y esta actividad representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Hayme está solicitando el préstamo para comprar madera al por mayor.
Hayme está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y desarrollarse en su actividad comercial.
texts.en:
This member is Hayme. She is part of the communal bank “Manos Juntas” (Hands Together) from the city of Cusco, Peru. This member is a young married mother of 3 school-aged children. Hayme runs a sawmill and sells any kind of wood for construction and carpentry; this business is her principal income and supports her family. Hayme is requesting the loan to buy wood in bulk. 

Hayme is happy with and grateful to Kiva for helping support and develop her business.

loans.use: buy wood in bulk.

loans.name: Álvaro

texts.es:
Álvaro tiene 48 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene cinco hijos. Él desde muy pequeño se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería. Cultivaba junto con su padre, con mucho esfuerzo lo enviaron a la escuela a estudiar el bachillerato agrícola. Con el paso del tiempo adquirió experiencia en el área veterinaria. Posteriormente, se acompaño en unión libre con su pareja y procrearon cuatro hijos; Álvaro sigue trabajando en la agricultura, ganadería y en la veterinaria. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar tres bovinos para repasto. De esta manera, podrá poseer otra fuente de ingresos cuando venda los animales a un mejor precio. Su propósito es, aprender más sobre la veterinaria, debido a que esta actividad le presenta mayores ingresos y más oportunidades.
texts.en:
Álvaro, 48, has a partner and 5 children. He’s been a farmer, land and livestock, since he was little, cultivating the soil alongside his father. With much effort, they sent him to school to study a degree in agriculture. With the passing of time, he gained experience in the area of veterinary. Previously, he was in a common-law relationship and had 4 children. Álvaro continues to work in agriculture, livestock and as a veterinarian. 

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy 3 bovines to fatten up and sell. That way he’ll have another source of income when he sells the animals at a better price. His purpose is to learn more about veterinary because it is an area that presents more opportunities and more income.

loans.use: buy three bovines to fatten up and sell.

loans.name: Lázaro

texts.es:
Lázaro tiene 20 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo. Desde muy temprana edad, se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado junto a su padre. Luego trabajo durante varios años como jornalero cuidando animales de otras personas. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación, logro terminar el noveno grado en la escuela; pero debido a las condiciones económicas de su familia no pudo continuar estudiando. Después, se caso y empezó a trabajar en una mototaxi alguilada, brindando sus servios de transporte en la zona donde vive.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para instalar la luz eléctrica en su casa. Con la inversión, él y su familia tendrán uno de los servicios básicos primordiales para un hogar. En un futuro piensa comprar su propia mototaxi, para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Lázaro is 20, married, and has a son. From an early age, he farmed and raised livestock with his father. He spent some years tending animals for others as a day laborer. He was able to finish ninth grade after much effort and dedication but was unable to continue his studies because of his family's finances. Later he married and started offering taxi service in his neighborhood.

He is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to install electricity in his house. With this investment, he and his family will have one of the most basic household services. He is thinking about buying his own taxi one day so that he can increase his income.

loans.use: to install electricity in his house.

loans.name: Soutoura Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq membres du groupe SOUTOURA sont essentiellement des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 43  ans, et  en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles polygames à NOUMOUSSO un des quartiers populaires de la ville de KADIOLO. 
Elles sont à leur neuvième prêt avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. Les prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés.
SANATA 1ère assise à droite sur la photo fait la vente de beurre de karité à dans ce groupe de femmes SOUTOURA. 
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt une dizaine de sacs de100kg de noix de karités. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages avoisinants Kadiolo ville et souvent au grand marché de la ville de Kadiolo les jour de foire.
Elle les vend après transformation en beurre de karité au marché le jour de foire  et en famille à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25.500 FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The five members of the SOUTOURA group are essentially married women with an average age of 43 and who have on average four children. They live for the most part in polygamous families in NOUMOUSSO,  a popular neighborhood in the city of KADIOLO. They are on their ninth loan with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to help satisfy their clientele. Their previous loans were properly repaid. 

SANATA, the first one sitting at the right of the photo, sells shea butter in this female group SOUTOURA. With her loan, she plans to buy a dozen 100kg-sacks of shea nuts. She stocks up in KADIOLO’s neighboring villages and often in the grand market in KADIOLO on market days. She sells them after making the shea butter at the market on market days and at home to a clientele of men and women for cash. She foresees making an average monthly profit of 25,500 FCFA, part of which will go towards repaying her loan and interest, and another of which will go towards her savings.

loans.use: to buy shea nuts

loans.name: Kary

texts.es:
Kary continua en el banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” y con la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y también vende productos secos como trigo, cebada, maíz entre otros. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes. 
Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Kary continues to be a member of the Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre Communal Bank and raise animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She also sells wheat, barley, corn etc. Kary now needs a loan to buy more guinea pigs.

She is happy to have the opportunity for a loan and promises to pay back the money.

loans.use: To buy animals such as guinea pigs

loans.name: Carlos Ovidio

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 42 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos. Él es una persona muy trabajadora, su padre le enseño las labores agrícolas, desde hace dos años se ha dedicado más a la agricultura ha cosechado 32 sacos de maíz; también se dedica a la albañilería, este trabajo no es muy frecuente; por lo que su fuerte es la agricultura. Los insumos agrícolas los adquiere, en una ciudad; para llegar ahí, debe viajar en autobús unas dos horas hasta llegar a su destino. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 4 animales; debido a que quiere aprovechar el pasto que le queda de la cosecha de maíz. Con la inversión no desperdiciara el pasto que posee y podrá obtener un ingreso extra, que le permitirá mejorar su vivienda y pagar los gastos de escrituración de su terreno; además de brindar el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 42, has a life partner and two children, and works hard. His father taught his to farm, which he has done more in the past two years and has harvested 32 sacks of corn. Though he is also a bricklayer, this work is not steady, and farming is his main income source. He buys his farming supplies in the city, which is a two-hour bus trip away.

He is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to buy four animals because he would like to take advantage of the grass left from the corn harvest. He won't waste the grass and will earn more income that he can use to make improvements to his house and pay property title fees and his children's education expenses.

loans.use: to buy four animals.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El socio es el joven padre de familia Alberto, casado y con 2 hijos pequeños, él continúa comercializando pollos  y los distribuye en uno de los mercados de la ciudad, actividad que representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia. Alberto está solicitando un préstamo para comprar más pollos y capitalizar su comercio para la próxima campaña navideña.  Alberto agradece a  KIVA por permitirle seguir trabajando y desarrollándose en su actividad económica.
Alberto pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en: This community bank member is Alberto; he is married with two small children. He continues with his business of selling chickens. He sells in one of the markets in the city. This is his main source of income, which allows him to support his family. He is requesting a loan to buy more chickens and provide capital to his business for the Christmas season. Alberto thanks KIVA for allowing him to continue working and developing his business. Alberto is a member of the "Manos Juntas" community bank, located in the city of Cusco, Perú.

loans.use: to buy chickens at wholesale price.

loans.name: Dielika

texts.fr:
DIELIKA est née vers 1971 à Kosansso Cercle de Sikasso et est mère de 5 enfants vivant dans une famille nucléaire avec son mari à Kadiolo (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
 DIELIKA mène cette activité de commercialisation des articles divers: savons traditionnels, beurre de karité, miel, noix de néré, céréales etc, depuis plus de six  ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et elle reçoit des commandes. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de les satisfaire,  elle décida de collaborer avec l’Institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso. Elle est à son cinquième prêt, les prêts passés ont été correctement remboursés.
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter 2 futs de miel. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages avoisinants Kadiolo. Elle les stockent dans son magasin et les revend au comptant à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes venant de SIKASSO et d’autres localités. 
Avec ce prêt, il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 65 000 FCFA. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
 Elle compte devenir une grossiste de bonne renommée à fin de satisfaire ses nombreux clients qui ne cessent de croître.
texts.en: DIELIKA was born around 1971 in Kosansso Cercle in Sikasso and is the mother of five children living in a nuclear family with her husband in Kadiolo (third administrative region in the Republic of Mali). DIELIKA has been selling diverse products: traditional soaps, shea butter, honey, locust nuts, grains, etc., for more than six years. Her experience has earned her a good reputation, and she thus gets a lot of orders. Thus, in order to have the necessary resources to satisfy them, she decided to collaborate with microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. She is on her fifth loan. The previous loans were properly repaid. This new loan will allow her to buy two barrels of honey. She stocks up in Kadiolo’s neighboring villages. She stocks them in her store and resells them for cash to a clientele comprised of men and women coming from SIKASSO and other localities. With this loan, she foresees earning an average monthly profit of 65,000 FCFA. This profit will allow her to pay the interest on her loan and invest in her business. She plans to become a wholesaler with a good reputation in order to satisfy her clientele, which keeps expanding.

loans.use: to buy honey

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Elizabeth, ella pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú. casada y con hijos ya adultos e independientes, ella es agente de turismo y trabaja en este negocio vendiendo paquetes y recorridos turísticos, actividad que representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su hogar, Elizabeth está solicitando el préstamo para comprar tickets de accesos a grupos arqueológicos.
Elizabeth está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse y desarrollarse en su actividad comercial.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a member of the community bank, "Manos Juntas", located in Cusco Perú. She is married and her children are already independent adults. She works as a travel agent, selling packages and tours. This is her main source of income which allows her to help support her home. She has requested a loan to buy tickets for access to archaeological sites. She is very happy and thankful with KIVA for allowing her to maintain and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy tickets for access to archaeological sites.

loans.name: María Expectación

texts.es:
La señora María Expectación y su esposo el señor Francisco son originarios del estado de Yucatán, tiene ya mas de cuarenta años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo. Son personas mayores de edad y tiene su patrimonio el cual desean realizarle algunas mejoras y acondicionarlo. Están solicitando un préstamo para los acabados del exterior y la elaboración de una losa al frente de la casa ya que actualmente solo tiene y una lona que les cubre del sol y la lluvia y como son persona de la tercera edad y necesitan más seguridad para su salud y evitar enfermedades.
La señora María Expectación recibe una pensión por parte del gobierno y el señor Francisco es pensionado de la compañía de Pemex por sus servicios por tantos años. 
Con el ingreso que recibe la señora María Expectación será para pagar el crédito y el pensión de recibe el señor Francisco es para los gastos familiares.
La señora María Expectación ya ha tenido créditos con KIVA los cuales fue para su negocio de abarrotes el cual por su enfermedad ya no pudo atenderlo y decidió mejor que una de sus hijas se hiciera cargo de su negocio.
texts.en:
María Expectación and her husband Francisco are natives of the state of Yucatán.  She has been living in the city of Nuevo Laredo for more than 40 years.

They're older and own their property, which they want to improve and refurbish.  They're requesting a loan to put the finishing touches on the outside of the house and to install a slab in front of their house.  Currently they have only a canvas that protects them from the sun and rain, but they're senior citizens and they need better security for their health and to avoid illness.

María Expectación receives a government pension and Francisco receives a pension from Pemex for his long service to that company.  The income María Expectación earns will be to pay back the loan, and Francisco's pension is for the family expenses.

María Expectación has had previous loans with Kiva for her grocery store business.  She was no longer able to run it because of her illness, though, so she decided it was better for one of her daughters to take charge of her business.

loans.use: to finish the exterior of the house and to install a slab in front

loans.name: Blanca Concepción

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos; Diana de 17 años de edad que estudia segundo año de bachillerato y Emerson de 9 años que estudia tercer grado. Su esposo se dedica a la producción de ganado lechero. Desde hace tres años su esposo alquila un cafetín, ella siempre lo ha apoyado; pero desde abril ella junto a su cuñada han tomado la administración del cafetín, pues su esposo se ha dedicado por completo al cuido de su ganado. Lo que más vende en el cafetín son las pupusas, hamburguesas, licuados, jugos, gaseosas y boquitas. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para reparar el techo y la parte del corredor de su vivienda. Debido a que en la pasada época lluviosa le dejo filtraciones de agua y humedad; además que en la parte del corredor almaceno mercadería del cafetín y se le mojo en varias ocasiones. Por lo que desea aprovechar la oportunidad de solventar el problema con el préstamo. A ella le gustaría en un futuro instalar un servicio sanitario en su casa lavable y no el de letrina que es el que posee en este momento.
texts.en:
Blanca is 42 years old, is married and has two children; Diana is 17 years old and is studying in the second year of junior high and Emerson is 9 years old and is studying third grade. Her husband produces dairy cattle. For three years her husband has rented a small café and she has always helped him, but since April she has taken on the management of the small café together with her sister-in-law. Then her husband has completely devoted himself to taking care of his cattle. The things they most sell in the small café are pupusas [stuffed tortillas], hamburgers, milk shakes, juices, soda and snacks.

The loan that is being requested from Fundación Campo is to repair the roof and part of the corridor of her housing, because in the past rainy season she was left with leaks of water and humidity, as well as in the part of the corridor she stored merchandise for the small café and it got wet on several occasions. Because of this she wants to take advantage of the opportunity to solve the problem with the loan. In the future she would like to install a washable toilet in her house and not the latrine that is the one that she owns at this time.

loans.use: to repair the roof and the part of the corridor of her housing.

loans.name: Nilda Araceli

texts.es: La socia  es la señora Nilda, ella pertenece al banco “Manos Juntas” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú del Cusco – Perú.  La socia es una joven madre de familia de 37 años de edad que tiene 3 hijos pequeños, 2 de los cuales están en edad escolar y una bebé,  Nilda se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores, especialmente de cuyes, los cuales distribuye de manera directa a solicitud de sus clientes, y esta actividad representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Nilda está solicitando el préstamo para comprar más cuyes y cubrir la demanda de su mercado.
texts.en: Nilda is a member of the “Manos Juntas” (Hands Together) communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru del Cusco, Peru.  She’s a young, 37-year-old mother of three little ones, two of which attend school and a baby girl.  Nilda works raising and selling small farm animals, especially guinea pigs; she sells direct to her customers and this activity is her main source of income for family support.  Nilda’s asking for a loan to buy more guinea pigs to respond to market demand.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs.

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 45 años de edad, esta acompañada. Ella se dedica al comercio de gallinas; empezó a la edad de los 12 años vendiendo con una señora que era su vecina. Así, fue como le fue gustando el negocio, viajaba a la capital a vender las gallinas. Es una actividad que le gusta mucho, gracias a su trabajo a podido ir creciendo en su negocio, otra cosa que le gusta es que su madre también se dedicaba a la misma actividad.  Las gallinas se las llevan a vender a su casa, por que es una persona muy conocida y responsable; los días lunes, miércoles y viernes ella sale en su pick up, con destino a la capital del país a dejar las gallinas, ella trabaja más que todo por pedido ya tiene a sus clientes. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 1000 gallinas y pagar unas que debe. Así, mejorara en gran medida sus ingresos que le servirán para ir mejorando el negocio. Su más grande deseo es comprar una casa en la ciudad, por ser más céntrico para las personas que le llegan a vender las gallinas.
texts.en:
Blanca, 45, has a companion.  Her business is selling chickens.  She started at the age of 12 selling with a woman who was her neighbor.  This is how she grew to like the business; she’d travel to the capital to sell the chickens.  It’s an activity she likes very much and thanks to her work the business has been growing.  Another thing she likes is that he mother was also in the same business.  The chickens are delivered to her at home because she’s a very well-known, responsible person.  On Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays she heads to the nation’s capital in her pick-up to deliver the chickens.  She works mostly on order since she already has her regular customers.

The loan she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy 1000 chickens and to pay for some she still owes on.  In this way, she will greatly improve her income that will be useful for her to continue improving the business.  Her greatest desire is to buy a house in the city because it would be more centrally located for the people who come by to sell her the chickens.

loans.use: to buy 1000 chickens and to pay for some she still owes on.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a showcase to store food.

loans.name: Alejandra María

texts.es: Alejandra de 40 años de edad, es madre cabeza de familia de dos hijos,  ha laborado durante 8 años vendiendo ropa a familiares y amigos, actividad que le ha permitido sostener el hogar y brindarles estudio a sus hijos. Ella desea poderle ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, por eso sueña con ampliar su negocio y montar un gran almacén aunque asegura que eso será en el mediano plazo, por el momento se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el que comprará surtido para la temporada navideña aprovechando que muchas familias compran ropa en ese tiempo.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 40 years old and is the mother of two children and the head of the household. She has been working for the last 8 years selling clothes to family and friends, which has enabled her to provide for her family and pay for her children’s schooling. 

She wants to be able to offer her family a better quality of life, and to achieve this dream she wants to grow her business and eventually set up a big store, although she realizes that that will be in the more distant future. At the moment, she is requesting a loan to buy a variety of merchandise for the Christmas season, taking advantage of the fact that many families buy clothing at this time.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es: Diana de 45 años de edad, es una mujer que sueña con brindarles un mejor futuro a sus tres hijos, por eso desde hace 2 años decidió vender productos de la canasta familiar en su casa habilitando un espacio de su vivienda para montar su negocio, el cual abre todos los días de 7 de la mañana a 10 de la noche. Su objetivo es poder colaborar con los gastos del hogar  a su esposo.  Su mayor sueño es ver crecer a sus hijos, ofrecerles una buena educación mejorándoles su calidad de vida “pues son ellos la razón de nuestra existencia” asegura Diana. En la actualidad solicita un crédito que para invertir en la compra de surtido  y víveres para la temporada navideña.
texts.en:
Diana, 45 years old, is a woman who dreams of providing a better future for her three children, so two years ago she decided to sell household items in her home equipping a space in her home to set up her business. It is open every day from 7 in the morning until 10 at night. Her objective is to be able to share the household expenses with her husband. 

Her biggest dream is to see her children grow up, offering them a good education improving their quality of life, “as they are the reason for our existence,” says Diana. 

Currently she is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of supplies and provisions for the holiday season.

loans.use: to buy supplies and provision for the holiday season for her home-based store.

loans.name: El Museo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios una de ellas es Ileana quien tiene una pulpería y también  compra y vende chatarra,  hace 6 años  de esa forma inicio su negocio con los margen de ganancias que le generaba el comercio de la chatarra fue comprando productos de pulperías en menor escala. Tiene 5 años de estar  con la institución tiene 3 hijos que juntos con  su compañero de vida le ayuda en la compra y venta  de chatarra, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico etc. Sobeyda vende productos Herbalife y venta de CD ambulante y Edwin fabrica guitarra en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This is a group consisting of three people.  One of them is Ileana who has a grocery store and also buys and sells scrap metal.  She’s been in business six years.  She started the store with profits generated from the scrap metal business.  She gradually bought grocery items on a small scale.  She’s been with the institution five years and she has 3 children; her life companion helps her with the buying and selling of scrap metal.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, etc.

Sobeyda sells Herbalife products and CDs from place to place and Edwin manufactures guitars at home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Jesús Hernán

texts.es: Jesús Hernán ha dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a labores del campo, actividad que le genera los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Lleno de sueños espera poder ser uno de los mejores agricultores de su localidad, diversificar su producción combinando la siembra de tomate de aliño con otras frutas u hortalizas. En la actualidad su gran prioridad es solicitar un crédito para la compra de polietileno con el fin de entechar una de las estructuras del invernadero, debido a que un huracán le destruyó el techo hace algunos días.
texts.en:
Jesús Hernán has dedicated the greater part of his life to working in the fields, an activity that has generated the resources for sustaining his family. Full of dreams, he hopes to be one of the best farmers in his area, and to diversify his production by combining the planting for the tomato with other fruits and vegetables. 

At present his top priority is requesting a loan for the purchase of polyethylene in order to put a roof on one of his greenhouse structures, as a hurricane destroyed the roof a few days ago.

loans.use: to buy polyethylene.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La Señora. María se encuentra realizando el tercer crédito en el banco comunal Renacer Uncovia, vive por el centro de la Ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que goza de un clima frió, esta bañada por 4 ríos, es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad desde Diciembre de 1999 gracias a su arquitectura colonial, su gente es amable, gentil y aun conservan la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. María es madre soltera, tiene 30 años de edad y ha concebido un hijo de 6 años de edad que está estudiando en una escuelita de la cuidad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Ella trabaja como empleada en una pastelería de la cual gana un sueldo mensual, también realiza pasteles, galletas, etc. pero independientemente desde su casa cuando le hacen algún pedido, se dedica a esta actividad económica hace 8 años. Los fines de semana le ayuda a su madre a la venta de comida, ellas realizan toda clase de platos.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de moldes, vitrinas y harina para continuar creciendo en su negocio de pasteles.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Señora María is requesting her third loan from the communal bank Renacer Uncovia.  She lives in the center of Cuenca, a city that has a cold climate, is bathed by four rivers and has been, thanks to its colonial architecture and friendly, kind people that still preserve their culture and village traditions, a World Heritage site since 1999.

Señora María is a 30-year old single mother who has a 6-year old son.  Her son goes to a small school in the city.  She does not have her own home and instead is a renter. 
 
Señora María works in a bakery and is paid a monthly salary.  She also makes cakes and cookies etc. independently in her home whenever she has orders. She has had her business for eight years.  On weekends, she helps her mother to sell food; they make all kinds of dishes. 

She is going to invest her loan in the purchase of baking molds, display cases and flour to continue growing her own pastry business. 

Señora María's goal is to own her own home.

loans.use: to purchase baking molds, display cases and flour.

loans.name: Camino De Luz Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Mildred quien tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo menor de 6 años, se dedica a vender carne de res, cosméticos de la Avon, ropa nueva desde 18 meses, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en la compra de una res, y compra de zapatos, ropa, cosméticos por encargos. Mireya vende sandalias, y ropa nueva, Maria Magnolia vende ropa y sandalias.
texts.en:
This is a group formed by three members.  One of them is Mildred who is 27-years-old, married and has a six-year-old son.  She’s sold beef, Avon cosmetics and new clothes for 18 months.  She will use the loan to buy a head of cattle and to buy shoes, clothes and cosmetics to order. 

Mireya sells sandals and new clothes and María Magnolia sells clothes and sandals.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle, shoes, clothes and Avon cosmetics.

loans.name: John Enrique

texts.es: John Enrique de 47 años de edad   se dedica a la orfebrería desde hace más de 30 años, actividad que le ha permitido sostener su hogar y brindarle a sus hijos vivienda y educación. Su mayor reto ha sido sacar adelante a su familia pese a que ha tenido que afrontar  situaciones económicas bastante difíciles ya que en ocasiones su trabajo no tiene la demanda esperada o en otras no tiene el capital suficiente para satisfacer el nivel de pedidos, como le sucede actualmente. Por esta razón se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito para comprar la materia prima y poder incrementar su productividad, lo cual mejorará sus ingresos y su calidad de vida
texts.en:
John Enrique is 47 years old and has made a living as a goldsmith for more than 30 years. This business has allowed him to sustain his home and provide his children with housing and an education. 

His greatest goal has been to get his family ahead, as he has had to face quite difficult financial situations. Sometimes his work hasn’t had the demand expected, and other times he hasn’t had enough capital to satisfy the level of requests, as is currently the case. For this reason he is seeking a loan to buy raw materials to be able to increase his productivity, which will improve his income and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (goldsmithing)

loans.name: Jorge Isaac

texts.es: Para Jorge la vida no ha sido color de rosa, desde muy joven le tocó enfrentarse al mundo laboral debido al fallecimiento de sus padres. Sin educación y con pocas oportunidades de empleo decidió dedicarse a la venta ambulante como medio de sostenimiento. Jorge desea poder tener mayores oportunidades en la vida y mejorar su calidad de vida por lo cual quiere invertir en su negocio con el fin de generar ingresos. Esta seguro que la temporada navideña es una buena oportunidad y por eso se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que espera comprar surtido para la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en: For Jorge life has not been a bed of roses.  He had to face the working world when he was very young because of the death of his parents.  With no education and with few work opportunities he decided to sell on foot in order to support himself.   Jorge would like to have more opportunities and improve his quality of life so he wants to invest in his business in order to increase his income.  He is sure that the Christmas season will provide a good opportunity so he is asking for a loan in order to buy year end merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Luis Ángel

texts.es: Don Luis Ángel es zapatero de profesión. Desde hace 16 años se dedica a la fabricación de calzado, montó su negocio en una de las habitaciones de su casa, debido a que su situación económica no le permite ubicarse en un local. Desde allí elabora su producción que posteriormente comercializa en diferentes municipios del departamento de Antioquia. Luis se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que espera comprar materia prima para aumentar su capacidad de producción y generar mayores ingresos. Su mayor sueño es poder ampliar su negocio y montar una gran empresa  para generar empleos.
texts.en:
Don Luis Ángel is a shoemaker by profession. He has been making shoes for the past 16 years. He started his business in one of the rooms of his house since his financial situation did not permit to open his own shop. The shoes he produces he later sells in different towns in the department of Antioquia.

Luis is requesting a loan to purchase basic materials to increase his production and generate higher earnings. His greatest dream is to expand his business and start a large enterprise and create jobs.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies to make shoes.

loans.name: Luisa Fernánda

texts.es: Luisa Fernanda de 18 años de edad, es una joven llena de sueños y con un proyecto de vida claro. Se encuentra terminando su bachillerato, pero desde ya,  se visiona como una gran empresaria. Es una luchadora y amante a los negocios, por esto se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo con el fin de ahorrar para sus estudios universitarios. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de productos para generar ingresos. Su mayor sueño es poder ser una gran profesional  y poderle colaborar a su madre con las obligaciones del hogar.
texts.en: Luisa Fernanda is 18 years old and is full of dreams and with a clear life’s path.  She is finishing her bachelor’s degree but she already sees herself as a great entrepreneur.  She works hard and loves business, so she sells products via catalog so that she can save up for her university studies.  She is asking for this loan so that she can invest in products that will generate income for her.  Her grandest dream is to be able to be a great professional and be able to help her mother with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Rosas Rojas  (Paute) Group

texts.es:
Rosas Rojas es un banco constituido hace algunos años, está formado por 9 mujeres quienes son amigas y conocidas, las señoras se reúnen una vez al mes para conversar de varios temas y también para salir de la rutina diaria, se caracterizan por ser amables, gentiles y muy carismáticas. Viven en el cantón Paute lugar que goza de una exuberante belleza gracias a sus tierras fértiles donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores, sus hermosos paisajes son inolvidables y el calor de su gente es muy cálido.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora. María Mercedes, forma parte del banco comunal Rosas Rojas hace dos años,  tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos de 29, 20, 16 y 10 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, su segundo hijo trabaja y le ayuda económicamente y también los fines de semana se dedica a estudiar en un colegio a distancia, su tercera hija está estudiando en el colegio y su ultimo hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad siendo el fruto de su trabajo.

Doña María Mercedes trabaja de jornalera pero solo cuando le llaman sus conocidas para que realice esta actividad, también se dedica a la cría de cuyes y tiene ganado que le produce leche la misma que es para la venta. Esta cultivando sus terrenos con hortalizas que también son para la venta. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de semillas para sus cultivos, abono y cuyes de mejor calidad.
 
Su meta es ampliar su criadero de cuyes.

Las dos fotos pequeñas son de tres socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
Rosas Rojas is a communal bank that was started several years ago. It is made up of nine women who are friends and acquaintances. The women meet once a month to talk about various issues and also to take a break from their daily routines. They are known to be friendly, kind and very charismatic. They live in Paute Commune, a place known for its exuberant beauty thanks to it fertile land where the most beautiful flowers are grown. Its beautiful landscapes are unforgettable and its people are very warm.

One of the members of this group is Sra. Maria Mercedes, who has been a member of the Rosas Rojas Communal Bank for two years. She is 49 years old and a single mother of four children, who are 29, 20, 16 and 10 years of age. Her oldest daughter is married and lives independently; her second, a son, works and helps her financially while also taking online classes on weekends; her third, a daughter, is a school student and her youngest, a son, is also studying at a school in the city. She owns her home, which is the fruit of her labor.

Doña María Mercedes works as a day laborer but only when acquaintances call her to perform some task. She also raises guinea pigs and owns cattle, which she milks for sale. She cultivates vegetables in her fields, which she sells, as well. 

Her new loan is to purchase seeds for her plants as well as compost and a better quality of guinea pigs.  Her goal is to expand her guinea pig raising business..

The two small photos are of three members who could not be present when this photo of the group was taken.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Resolucion Group

texts.es: Está formado por tres socias una de ellas es Jessenia que vende ropa usada y ropa nueva desde hace 5 años de forma ambulante y por encargo es una mujer casada tiene dos hijos y su esposo es taxista que le brinda servicio de transporte a la sociedad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa usada por piezas y compra de ropa nueva para adultos y niños, Marlene vende ropa y cosméticos de la Avon, Aura Lila vende productos de cosméticos de la Vogue por encargos.
texts.en: This group is made up of three women.  Jessica has been selling second hand and new clothing to order and on foot for five years.  She is married and has two children.  Her husband works as a taxi driver.  She will use the money from this loan to buy new and used clothing for adults and children, by the piece.  Marlene sells clothing and Avon cosmetics.  Aura Lila sells Vogue cosmetics to order.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es: La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” y con la venta de carne, papa, chuño, haba verde, moraya y queso. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la venta verduras y le va muy bien. Solicita el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro.  Es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia y está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues in the “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” communal bank and selling meat, potatoes, dehydrated potatoes, green lima beans, dried tuber and cheese.  She’s been selling vegetables for many years now and does very well.  She requests the loan to repair her cart.  She’s a responsible, kind person who supports her family and is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to repair her cart.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” y con la elaboración de pan. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. Solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como sacos de harina.  Es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia y está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues in the “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” communal bank and baking bread.  She’s been in this business for years and does very well.  She’s requesting the loan to buy supplies like sacks of flour.  She’s a responsible, kind person who supports her family and is happy with the loan and committed to making her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour.

loans.name: Salome

texts.es: La socia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” y con la elaboración y venta de pan. Ya son varios años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. Solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de harina, sacos de azúcar, manteca y otras cosas más. Es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia y está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: She continues in the “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” communal bank and baking bread to sell.  She’s been in business several years now and does very well.  She’s requesting the loan to buy ingredients like sacks of flour, sacks of sugar, shortening and other things.  She’s a responsible, kind person who supports her family and is happy with the loan; she’s committed to making her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, sacks of sugar, shortening and other things.

loans.name: Candy Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Carlota que hace 10 años vende prendas de plata y oro , es casada, tiene 43 años y cuatro hijos de 29, 28,20 y 7 años de edad. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de oro y  plata como pulseras, chapas, anillos, cadenas, brazaletes etc. Juana tiene un kiosco ubicado en un colegio cercano a su domicilio y Byron vende frutas en un mercado capitalino.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three partner entrepreneurs. One of them is Carlota, who has been selling gold and silver pieces for ten years. She is married, 43, and has four children ages 29, 28, 20 and 7. She will invest the loan in the purchase of gold and silver pieces such as bracelets, badges, rings, chains, etc. 

Regarding the other two partners, Juana has a kiosk located in a high school close to her home, and Byron sells fruit in a market in the capital.

loans.use: to invest in gold and silver pieces such as rings, earrings, bracelets, chains, and badges
